1.text: I'm surprised how good these things are. To eat. Starting from the head, working my way down, ahahaha...

comments.text: Hang on, you can EAT those?!
Assessment: Manjuu are inedible. Photograph depicts a stylized confectionery, likely a bun.
I've come up with a new recipe: Commander buns. If anyone wants to make some later, do let me know.
Commander buns? I'm all in... Give me the ingredients and I'll have 500 ready by tomorrow~
No, we're not baking! Stop messing around!

options.text: Looks delicious!

reply.text: Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~

options.text: Don't eat the poor things!

reply.text: Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~

2.text: Orders received from Master: "do whatever you want." Attention: unable to deduce meaning of said phrase.

comments.text: We have the day off, just play around and have some fun! :D
Requesting examples of activities classified as "playing around and having fun."
Examples? Umm, surfing or sunbathing I guess? Maybe building a sandcastle? I think you'd like that
"Build a sandcastle." Interest piqued...
Are you SERIOUSLY chilling on the beach? We've got stuff to do.
Cmon, don't be the no-fun police! It's our day off, let loose a little! > <
Let loose?! Are you implying I'm all wound up?!

options.text: Just do whatever you think will be fun.

reply.text: Requesting list of conditions necessary for "fun" to take place.

options.text: Building a sandcastle sounds like a good idea!

reply.text: Orders received, directive updated. Commencing sandcastle construction.

comments.text: wtf...
Emotion experienced during construction process identified as "enjoyment."
Haha! Sounds like you had fun!
Okay, I'll admit it looks cool. But it's not AMAZING or anything.
I saw you tried to make a sandcastle too, but couldn't even manage to built a small tower. You have my sympathies.
Who asked for YOUR sympathy? I sure didn't!
Assistance with sandcastle construction is available, Hipper.
Keep it! I don't need your help!

options.text: Awesome sandcastle!

reply.text: Conditions for experiencing the emotion known as "fun" have been met.

4.text: #lunch #burgersBought lunch for everyone! This stuff was HEAVY!

comments.text: You carried that fast food like a boss, sis!
I would've gone with you if you'd told me...!
Way to go, Cleve! We'll buy for you next time!
Aww, what a sweet big sister.

options.text: Heavy? As in, on the arteries?

reply.text: Lol, kinda. One burger every now and then has never killed anyone tho :D

5.text: #Night_battle Fly me to the moon, and let me play among the stars.

comments.text: Uh, what?
Starting simulation to calculate amount of energy required to travel to and play among celestial bodies...
Uhh... what?
Let me see what spring is like on Jupiter and Mars... Such romantic lyrics.

options.text: Want me to ask Akashi how much it'd cost to go to space?

reply.text: It is painfully evident that you have no sense of romance, Master.

6.text: #hobbyhour #guitarI'm feeling it! My guitar and I are in perfect sync today!

comments.text: Wow! Your guitar looks AWESOME! :D
Uh, sure... But I'm not fishing for compliments here! I'm so NOT happy you think it looks cool!
What was it Eugen said about tradition? Blonde, flat as a board, has attitude problems?
EXCUSE ME?! Are you saying I'm an ARCHETYPE?! Oh, you're gonna get it...
Proposal: repaint guitar with colors associated with the Vichya Dominion.
Your guitar is such a gorgeous shade of red...

options.text: Rock 'n roll, Hipper!

reply.text: Huh? What's this all of a sudden?

7.text: It's late and I'm in the practice room, but I just can't get fired up without the Commander by my side...

comments.text: Please practice without the Master in attendance. We *all* need to rehearse.
If you say you're gonna do something, do it right! Don't make excuses!
My, you seem very serious about this. Pardon me if I'm mistaken, but didn't a certain somebody say, "It's not like this is worth getting worked up over or anything"
Excuse me?! When did I ever say something like that?! You're TOTALLY wrong AND misremembering!
*Sigh*... If only the Commander was here for me...
Assessment: "practice" seems entertaining.
I know you're doing your best in there, Akagi! Keep it up! ^.^

options.text: Give it your all out there.

reply.text: THE COMMANDER REPLIED! Yes, I promise! I'm feeling much more motivated already!

options.text: Sorry I can't be there in person.

reply.text: It's okay, Commander! The moment I'm finished, I'll go straight to your office so we can be together!

8.text: #growingbonsai I heard if you play music to plants they'll grow faster. Maybe it likes rock?

comments.text: Huh? Maybe a beanstalk from some fairytale would.
Scientific consensus on the practice of using sound waves to stimulate organic growth: unproven.
Well maybe it'll work anyway...
Perhaps the bond between us will grow faster if I sing to the Commander every day...
Ahaha... I guess?
With you caring for it, it will surely grow into a wonderful bonsai whether you play music to it or not.
True! I take good care of my little plants.

options.text: It could work, maybe.

reply.text: You really think so? :o

9.text: #Practice I am practicing my part. It is not quite satisfactory yet.

comments.text: What? You're plenty good already, Sheffy!
Music, much like cleaning, are skills that can always be improved. I am far from perfect.
Sure. At least get good enough to not drag everyone else down!
Certainly. But perhaps you should take your own advice, Hipper.
Excuse me? I AM practicing! Geez!

options.text: I'd love to hear your singing, live.

reply.text: That can be arranged, Master. Would you mind if I sing a song that also places a curse on you? ...I am joking, of course.

10.text: #coffeebreak #getsmegoing A nice cup of coffee after work really hits the spot.

comments.text: I'm more of a tea person, myself.
Okay? Coffee boosts your alertness way more than tea does.
I'm baffled by how some people unironically enjoy drinking something that tastes like burnt dishwater.
YOU baffle ME! EVERYONE drinks coffee! You just have no idea how to brew it!
I guess you could say it's not her cup of tea... How about an ice cold Oxy-cola to help cool down?

options.text: You enjoy black coffee?

reply.text: Yeah, I guess?

11.text: #TrainingGascogne is self-evaluating ability to sing with emotion.

comments.text: What you need is love. Yes, love. LOVE makes everything possible!
Topic: "love" identified. Attention: database lacking in records on this emotion.
Just follow your heart and do what feels right! No regrets or second guessing!
Cleve's right. I'd take her words to heart if I were you.

options.text: You're a great singer, Gascogne.

reply.text: Assessment: interpreting praise of singing ability as equal to praise of emotional capacity may cause disruptions in analytic systems...

12.text: My fortune slip says my luck will be excellent~! What fortuitous things could happen today? A liaison with the Commander, perhaps~?

comments.text: You should refrain from making blog posts like this, dear sister...
And why should I refrain from expressing my love for the Commander, Kaga?
Please, let's stick to using our usernames...
Business as usual for Akagi I guess xD
You too. Usernames, got it?
Maybe I'll buy a fortune slip sometime later too. Not that I'm curious in any way.

options.text: That's nice.

reply.text: Why don't you buy one as well, Commander? Then we can move on to the next step: tying the knot~

13.text: #out-of-season-oktoberfestNothing goes together like beer and bratwurst!

comments.text: Not nagging for 5 seconds and actually enjoying yourself? Who are you and what have you done to Hipper?
Excuse me? Who said I'm enjoying myself? And don't you have something better to do?
There, that's more like it! I was starting to worry that you'd deviated from your archetype.
Normally, I feel awkward at parties... but being with my Iron Blood friends makes it easier.
It's nice to have a celebration every once in a while... Plus it offers Spee many opportunities to socialize and have fun! Ahahahah!

options.text: Those sausages look yummy.

reply.text: Prost!

options.text: It sounds like you really wish you were here, am I right? Maybe we'll let you join us at some point!

reply.text: Uh, yeah, prost. It's a shame you're not here to enjoy it, isn't it? Who knows, maybe SOMEONE will let you join us!

14.text: #gardening #flowers Wow this is starting to look real good now!

comments.text: You have an interest in not just growing bonsai, but gardening in general?
Yup! Gardening and bonsai growing are sorta similar!
Detecting floral lifeforms in bloom.
How about trying your hand at a more beautiful flower? If so, may I suggest... the red spider lily?
Seriously? That's way too advanced for a beginner. A gerbera, cosmos, or viola would be more her level.
Wow, I didn't know you knew so much about gardening! Are you into it too?
Not really? That's all just common knowledge.

options.text: Cleveland, the green-fingered light cruiser!

reply.text: LOL I'm just a beginner! This is nothing special ^^'

15.text: #Microphone #disassembly I was interested to see how a microphone looks on the inside. This is what I found.

comments.text: STOP! You're gonna break it if you go any further!
Somehow not surprised to see Sheffy picking stuff apart. Dunno why O_o
Ah, the thrill of breaking things. I share Sheffield's sentiment~
You too! STOP!

options.text: Stop! Think of the poor mic!

reply.text: Your disassembly looks really professional.

options.text: Hmph. Very well.

reply.text: Ah, do you enjoy breaking down things into their basic components as well, Master?

Wait, you like cute things Hipper? I didn't know that :o
Uh, no?! Someone just took my phone and used it to make this post, that's all!
You're following your archetype quite well today.
OMG! STOP PARROTING EUGEN ALL THE TIME!!!

options.text: You're right, it IS cute!

reply.text: You should buy one for yourself.

options.text: Whatever!

reply.text: Why would I?!

17.text: #rehearsal #justidolstuff Phew! I love working up a sweat on stage, cause it means I'm giving it my all!

comments.text: You were amazing, Cleve! I wish I'd brought a camera to record it!
Thanks, but I wouldn't say amazing ^^'
You're the EMBODIMENT of amazing! You're awesomely amazing!
I appreciate it, but people are gonna start calling you a shill lol
I've gotta jump in on this convo! You're the awesomest amazingest cutest ever, sis!
OMG PLEASE STOOOOOOP
Must be nice having such, uh, supportive sisters.

options.text: IN CLEVE WE BELIEVE!

reply.text: I get you. Nothing beats a good drumming session!

options.text: Even YOU'RE doing it Commander?! Cmon, stop, I mean it!

reply.text: Heck yeah! I knew you'd understand, Commander!

18.text: Unable to assess degree of necessity for depicted items.

comments.text: High! Isn't it for granted that we as girls, not just idols, would want to make ourselves beautiful?
Straight to the point, I see.
I'm certainly not an expert at applying makeup, but I could gladly help you with it.
Uhh... Sry, but I know nothing about makeup. I'll ask Helena about it next time, ok?

options.text: You're amazing just the way you are.

reply.text: You'll always be you, no matter what, Gascogne.

reply.text: Detecting disruptions within emotion capacitor...

Maybe I should pick up a recipe book and bake something too... You know, just try something girly for once I guess ^^'
Oh my, I didn't know you had a girlish side, senpai~ Hopefully you didn't mistake the salt for the sugar again~
Sis, please... Stop trying to troll her...
Oh, I'm not angry, I can take a jab or two from my friends. Vixens who dare whisper lies about me to the Commander, on the other hand...

options.text: They look really tasty.

reply.text: Please stay right there and I'll go deliver them to you, Commander!

Doubt

who dares impugn senpai's repulation?! i won't forgive them lmfao

Oh right, you guys were having a baseball game today...

How? I just drank all the vodka stored inside, then went in. What about it?
You drank EVERYTHING inside and live to tell the tale?!
I am THIS close to cracking open a cold one right now...

maybe ur the reason she's so stressed lmao

options.text: If your ice cream is hot, something's gone very wrong.

reply.text: Lmao, you got me there. Genuinely though, 10/10 ice cream, I recommend it!

124.text: Tonight, our hero Reno takes on monstrous villains from a strange land!

comments.text: You took a picture of that? Ahaha... When I saw that little girl looking scared, I couldn't help but dash out in front of her...
That's because you're a gallant hero, Reno.
Yeah! You're so cool you deserve an origin story movie! :D
Looking back at it, it's a bit embarrassing, but thanks for taking the picture, Cleveland!
Those "namahage" might look scary, but they're servants of the gods who punish bad children and bring happiness to families... Or so the legends say.
Is that so?! I had always thought they were some sort of movie villain...
It's perfectly fine~ If anything, thanks for protecting Fumizuki. She's been talking about "her hero, Reno" ever since~

options.text: Reno, to the rescuuueee!

reply.text: Being called that by the person I admire... It's so embarassing >.<

125.text: Fish on rice... the expert craftsmanship of a chef who's honed his technique... I see. As expected of the culture of the respected Sakura Empire.

comments.text: Even if one lacks technique, if one puts their all into making sushi, their feelings will be conveyed... Or so I've heard, at least.
Which is to say, a chef expresses themselves through their cooking?
Also, what was it called... the wasabi? It gave me an unforgettable shock.
It's just as you say, Cardinal. For those of us in the service of Lord Iris who are used to bland food, it definitely would...
Bound to shock people who aren't used to it, that's for sure.
However, there's no doubt that even that was refined over a long period of time. Eating fish with soy sauce and wasabi. I consume all of it with the respect it's due.

options.text: If you're a first-timer, you should have it without the wasabi.

reply.text: Thank you for the suggestion. But we've already experienced the shocking flavor.

comments.text: A battleship on curry? Can you eat that battleship as well?
Nope, you can't. It's just for show, sadly.
Is this the famed naval curry?
I dunno, it tastes a little different from the naval curry our port has.
The weather appears to be perfect for curry.
Sure is! Cloudless days like these always put me in the mood for curry.

options.text: Compared to our naval curry, which one tastes better?

reply.text: Hard to say. Both are good in their own way!

options.text: Out shopping, eh?

reply.text: Yep, along with Passepartout!

127.text: Today, I learned that you're not supposed to double dip.

comments.text: Yup, that's because the sauce is for everyone to use.
Sigh, I can't believe I committed such a faux pas when I was the one invited there.
Was your first time, so don't worry about it too much.
Sorry for being so clueless. But now that I know, I'll make sure to follow the rules.
Hm? Is double dipping bad?
Uh-huh, it is. For sanitary reasons, double dipping is usually banned~

options.text: There are shops that let you double dip though.

reply.text: Really... What a wide world this is...

options.text: The skewers are really good too.

reply.text: Yep, I really enjoyed them.

128.text: Summer kiritanpo. Ah, what a treat.

comments.text: Hah, look at the doggie in the back. I can imagine the "GIMME MEAT!" so vividly.
Everyone loves meat, but don't forget to eat your vegetables.
Says the girl who didn't put any veggies on her plate!
What can I say? I'm a meat lover. Besides, it's kiritanpo, what's the big deal?
It sure is fun having hotpot with everyone like this.
Yes, we must all be thankful to Noshiro for bringing us together~
All I did was get everyone together. The delicious food, that's thanks to you.
No no, it's enough that you set the plan in motion. Make sure to invite us all againâ™ª

options.text: Kiritanpo hotpot sure is popular even in the summer.

reply.text: That's right. Commander, would you like to join us next time?

129.text: Nothing beats the sweet fragrance of afternoon tea~

comments.text: ...Why are you lighting incense?
Aromatherapy, of course. I heard it is perfect for relieving stress and improving one's mood. Would you like to try for yourself, Baltimore?
Stress relief, huh? I could use some of that...
Oh? Are you interested in aromatherapy too? I'd be glad to introduce you to all the different modalities and their applications!
Uhh, sounds good!
Is this essential information for an idol? Should I have Warspite brief me upon this matter...?
If you so desire, Your Majesty. Shall I make preparations for before the concert?
Shouldn't we plan it after an exercise or lesson?
Seems like we're a bit out of sync... in more ways than one.

options.text: I thought the point was to reduce stress...

reply.text: Oh, Commander, you probably could benefit too~ I'll bring some to your room next time~

130.text: Hehehe... I'll capture Commander's heart with this secret song~â™¡

comments.text: Ooh, can I listen to it?
This is for Commander's ears only! You, stay away!
When you put it like that, I only want to hear it even more~ What should I do~?
Hey... Don't get any weird ideas!
Hmm? Were you having a secret recording session without telling me?
This is a solo recording, so there's nothing in it for you! Besides, only Commander is worthy of listening to this... Ehehe...
Maybe I should do something solo as well~ Ahh, I wonder if I should give Commander a call~
Hmph. Don't miss the sound check. If you prevent Commander from enjoying my song...
Sure, sure~

options.text: I hope the contents are safe for work...

reply.text: My dearest Commander~ Taihou's passion and love for you are nothing but pure~

131.text: My wonderful sister is enjoying her break time.

comments.text: Triomphant?! When'd you take this?!
It was time for our lesson, so imagine my surprise when I found you sound asleep!
I just happened to oversleep! Yeah, because I'm such a hard worker!
Jeez... You should take your job more seriously!
Look, the idol biz is tough stuff! Gotta rest properly, you know!
you must've been really tired, cuz you missed out on Dunkerque's crullers
Maybe this is a new Sleeping Idol project? If anyone could pull it off, it's her.
Eh? Such a thing exists? Tell me more!
Sounds interesting! Anything I can do to help?
What... did I just read...

options.text: Le Mochi is cute.

reply.text: If you think so, then it falls upon me to deliver more sleeping faces... by sleeping.

options.text: What about your lesson though?

reply.text: Uhh... work/leisure balance?

132.text: This is cruel and unusual punishment...

comments.text: That's what you get for being late to the lesson. Besides, cleaning builds virtue!
Le Triomphant, I thought you were supposed to be on my side...
Sorry, sis... But for the sake of you being able to shine on stage...
Le Malin, you did a really good job! We really appreciate it!
F-fine... I suppose this was the right thing to do...
What a good girl. I'll make some more donuts for you.
Eh?! Donuts?

options.text: We told you it was a bad idea...

reply.text: I know, I know... But seriously, I just overslept...

options.text: Wow, looks great. You should help me out too.

reply.text: You can't trick me with that sweet talk! I'm gonna sleep twice as long today!

133.text: Those without talent... simply have to work harder!

comments.text: You go, girl! I can't wait to see you onstage!
That's just going to make me more nervous...
Just take a deep breath! Inhale! Exhale!
The honourable Master is cheering for you as well, Dido!
R-really...?
Indeed. You have the full support of me and the Royal Maids!
I am moved to tears by the overwhelming show of support for this unworthy maid...

options.text: You've got this, Dido!

reply.text: Oh, Master! Thank you! I'll work harder, so... please look forward to my performance!

options.text: Hope you're not pushing yourself too hard.

reply.text: Not at all...! As long as I think about you and the others, I feel like I can do anything!

134.text: So, I signed up because I heard there would be an "Idol Basketball Showdown," but I can't break any ankles in this outfit.

comments.text: You're not supposed to play hard. Just play cute.
Play cute...? What does that even mean...
Hah! It's not a showdown without two! How about it?
Now we're talking! Grab Cleveland as well!
Wait, it won't be an idol activity anymore at that point...
I like the sound of this. Count me in!
The Polaris outfits are so much easier to move around in.
Hah, yeah... Might be a bit rough, but at least you look gorgeous!
Please don't make fun of me like that!

options.text: Need to see more of this side of Balti.

reply.text: Huh? What side? Well, it's a good thing, right?

options.text: Basketball-playing idols? That's a crossover I want to see.

reply.text: Right? If only I didn't have to wear this outfit...

135.text: This newly released pudding is simply delectable~â™¡

comments.text: I was wondering where you dashed off to as soon as our rehearsal ended.
Shall I bring you some as well, Taihou?
Sure, I'd appreciate it.
All right, you got it~
DID SOMEONE SAY PUDDING? Ahh, but I'm so far away from a store...
There's one not too far from the venue.
Let's all go together next time~
Please bring me someeeee~

options.text: Maybe you all should make some sort of Foodie Club?

reply.text: Sounds fun, but I really just want to enjoy some smooth, creamy pudding.

options.text: You really love pudding don't you, Roon?

reply.text: Yeah, but not as much as I love... sharing pudding with you~

136.text: I'm a terrifying bunny from the North! Rawrrrr!

comments.text: Rawrrr~
Rawrrrrr~!!
Rawrrrrr~!!!
Rawrrrrrr~!!!!
STOP SPAMMING MY FEED
An overwhelming display of force... Truly impressive!
Your stage outfit looks super cute!
Is that so? It's certainly got that Northern Parliament energy, yeah?
That it does. But, there's still some room for improvement when it comes to the roaring.
...I see. I'll try to work on it.

options.text: I don't think rabbits roar...

reply.text: This one does. Rawrrrr!!

options.text: Rawr~!

reply.text: I see how it is! But I won't lose to you in a roar-off, dear comrade!

137.text: â˜†â˜†Albacore's got a surprise for y'all~â˜†â˜†

comments.text: Is it candy?!
Nobody needs any more of your surprises, Albacore...
It's something perfectly normal this time! Trust me! I just can't tell you what's inside~â˜†
Is that so... Well, maybe I'll give it another chance.
Why does my box look so weird compared to the others?
That's because you're also weird~ ...Just kidding! I hope you enjoy what's inside!
...You're not going to fool me again!
C'monnnn~ We're friends now. Open it already~

options.text: Woah, wonder what's inside?

reply.text: It wouldn't be a surprise if I told you. But don't worry, you're not missing out.

options.text: I swear your "surprises" are more anxiety-inducing than enemy attacks.

reply.text: Eh? Do you think I'm that sus or something? I never hurt anyone~

138.text: Thank goodness, there really wasn't anything weird inside...

comments.text: Jeez, Taihou, you act like I regularly put weird things into boxes.
You absolutely DO.
Fine, fine, I'm sorry! I swear I won't do it again ><
Nope, not buying it!
Haha, you two seem to get along really well.
Who could ever get along with a brat like her? Hmph!
How mean, Taihou~ Even after I sent you a postcard cheering you on~
Wow, Albacore, that looks cute. Did you draw that yourself?
Look, I appreciate it. Really.
Eheh~ You're welcome~â™ª

options.text: I ship this.

reply.text: Aw shucks, Commander~ Not you too~

comments.text: You took a perfectly good Meowfficer, and look, it has anxiety!
Eh, really? All I said was, "I'll help you return to the wild."
Return to the wild? You know, about the meowfficers...
Huh? I mean what I said...
This isn't getting anywhere...
Considering the meowfficers don't seem to listen to anyone, Roon seems to have some unique abilities.
But, I'm trying to smile as nicely as I can~
Didn't you say you were coming back to rehearsal? Yet here you are playing with the animals...
Heheh~ What can I say, I like cute things~â™ª
What... How did a meowfficer get here? I thought Akashi and the Commander were supposed to take care of them...
Commander? Is Commander coming?! Taihou wants to see you so!

options.text: Should we take it over to Akashi?

reply.text: I'm sure Akashi won't mind if I keep this little guy a little longer...

options.text: I'll take care of things.

reply.text: In that case, I'm coming to see you right now, Commander~â™¡

140.text: I'm not exactly your image of "a cute girl shining on stage," now am I?

comments.text: Of course you are, Baltimore! Well, I do know where you're coming from though, haha...
Cleveland, you were always the model of "cool." Are you also into this cutesy stuff?
They're equally important! But, what's most important is that we all work hard, together.
Yeah... but I just hope I don't make an utter fool of myself and drag down the others...
Look, you're doing great out there. Believe in yourself!
hmm... you do look a bit stiff though. remember, confidence is sexy!
Sigh... If only you could lend me some of your appeal.
you've got that in spades already! now's your chance to show it off!

options.text: Believe in the me that believes in you!

reply.text: Uh... I'm not sure I understand, but I'll try my best!

options.text: I think you're doing great.

reply.text: Really? ...I'll take your word for it then.

141.text: My dear sister at a recording session

comments.text: Formidable, did you take a picture of me? It's slightly embarrassing...
But look how many shares this picture has gotten! People are loving the look!
Are you interested in the idol business as well, Formidable? I think you'd have a bright future as a rock musician.
I-I have no interest in that stuff at all!
Sis, you look really focused...
Unicorn, you have a pretty serious aura around you when you sing as well.
I can't hold a candle to you at all though >.<

options.text: I'm hyped for your new release!

reply.text: I certainly do hope you enjoy it~

options.text: Will you be doing a signing session afterwards?

reply.text: I'd be glad to~ Shall I stop by your office for something a bit more... personal?

comments.text: wew! tashkent is chuggin' like a champ!
...What the heck are you drinking?
...Water. Is there a problem?
Thanks for coming to rehearsal today, Tashkent.
You too, Illustrious. By the way, I had some difficulty following the choreography today...
Don't worry about it. Nothing some practice can't solve.
I see. Thanks, I'll keep that in mind.

options.text: That's a very strange-looking water canteen.

reply.text: Is that so? ...It is what it is.

options.text: Maybe we should set up a watering station next time.

reply.text: Yeah? Probably.

143.text: I worked my butt off today as well!

comments.text: Dido, I'm coming to cheer for you!
Hermione... Sirius... Thank you for your support!
Everyone, including the Commander, was quite excited! Not a bad job you did, if I must say so myself!
Yes, that is reflected in the merchandise sales.
Merchandise...? What do you mean by that?
I have become such a big fan of yours that, uh...
She's been selling a bunch of merchandise supporting you!
You still look like you're really embarrassed.
Yeah, just thinking about everyone's eyes fixed upon me makes me nervous...
Well... that's part of what makes you cute, I guess.

options.text: I loved hearing you sing.

reply.text: Ah... Master, I'll work even harder to improve for your sake!

options.text: I agree. Very cute.

reply.text: C-cute? Ahh... I'm so happy I'm at a loss of words...

144.text: Universe in Unison? More like Albacore in SPACE!!

comments.text: Eh?! You flew to the moon?
With the power of the green screen! Can't let a perfectly good theme go to waste!
The stars and aliens are a good touch.
Zero gravity... means no more hard work... Now that's what I call heaven!
Hehe, can you imagine what it'd be like to actually live in space?
I could never imagine being so far away from Master...
I'm sure no distance could keep your feelings from being transmitted.
Really? Maybe I'll give it a shot then!

options.text: Are you planning on holding a concert in space?

reply.text: Sure am! Gotta see how the aliens react!

options.text: Just to be clear, nobody is actually going to space...

reply.text: You know what they say about landing among the stars, Commander! Go, go!

145.text: Hit us up at Akashi's Crepe Stand! We've got more flavors than you can shake a stick at!

comments.text: Thanks for the help with setting it all up, nya! Now I know why they call you the queen of all trades, nya.
Haha, don't worry about it, just happy to help!
Another part-time job, sis? This time, making crepes?
Yup! I got my favorite: mango vanilla! Stop by later and we'll treat you to one!
Really? Well, why not. I'll have the same, then!
We came, we saw, we all had good crepes (/ãƒ»Ï‰ãƒ»)/
Yes. I had several, and they were all delicious.
I did the contrarian thing and got a different flavor to everyone else... It tasted really nice.
With so many flavors you can pick from, you almost get choice overload...
Glad you all enjoyed it! ^o^

options.text: Commander's log: tried the mango vanilla. It was delish.

reply.text: I know, right? So glad we managed to get it on the menu!

options.text: Heard business is booming thanks to your hard work.

reply.text: Thank you for your patronyage~

146.text: Sat down with a friend and talked about stuff over drinks!

comments.text: We're on the same wavelength, you and I! And we think alike about our little sisters. I wish we'd met sooner.
Oh, I agree! It's almost criminal that we never met before today.
MY LITTLE SISTER DISCOURSE SENSE IS TINGLING! Let me tell you all about my little Indy! She's just the cutest in the universe!
Portland, please... You're embarrassing me...
Sounds like you had a good time together. Good for you, sis!
Time for the ol' checklist. Has a little sister: check. Attitude problems: check. Small bust... check.
OH MY GOD, I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU'VE DONE THIS!
Hey, you're right... Hipper's response sounds a bit like what Nagisa might say.
What?! Well, kind of, but not... not really?!

options.text: You seem like you'd have a lot in common.

reply.text: We do. Our little sisters, for starters. So much to talk about!

options.text: You could both use a chill pill every now and then.

reply.text: Excuse me? Are you saying I'm not perfectly chill at all times?!

147.text: A cup of milk a day keeps bone fragility at bay!

comments.text: Nothing like a bottle of cool milk after a hot bath!
Oh, that too! Me, I drink it more for the nutritional benefits!
You're making me thirsty. I could go for a drink...
Well, relevant to the topic at hand, how about some milk? You may find it beneficial in surprising ways!
I have a feeling like Laffey already has a drink in mind, and it isn't milk...
We concur! Milk is truly the finest beverage available!
It's smooth, yummy, and promotes growth! What's not to like?
Really? Then maybe I should start drinking it regularly too.
You?! Absolutely not! Destroyers will start getting trapped in orbit around you if you grow any bigger!
What...? Sorry, I don't follow...

options.text: Milk is udderly delicious.

reply.text: That's part of the reason why I drink it every day!

options.text: The best friend of any growing child: milk.

reply.text: Hey! I'm not a child anymore!

comments.text: That's a sweet-looking sandjuu!
Thanks! Honoka and I are calling it the Monumental Manjuu!
Sublime craftsmanship! Very nice.
New task received: construct even sublimer sand castle...!
Settle down. You already broke plenty of records with that last one.
I remember seeing pictures of that one! Gascogne just can't be beaten when it comes to sand castles!
I must admit, ours doesn't really rival hers... Honoka, we'll just have to build an even better one!
You're on!

options.text: It's even got a lifelike texture.

reply.text: You can attribute the degree of realism to the Manjuu model we had on hand!

options.text: You make quite the dream team, eh?

reply.text: Yep! The dream team doing teamwork to make the dream work!

149.text: Best pic from the beach photoshoot: Monica's GOAT receive!

comments.text: Oh, you're such a talented photographer, Aoba! It is a bit embarrassing though, seeing a picture of myself...
Hey, kudos to you for making the shot possible! It's an eyecatcher in more ways than one.
Why, thanks! Let me know if you're ever doing another shoot!
She beat me, both in volleyball and in bounciness T-T
Don't be sad, we did the best we could, Sara!
I know... But while we lost in volleyball together, you at least tied in the bounciness department...
Wh-what?! Nobody told me we'd be graded on that, too!

options.text: Nice... receive. Yeah, let's go with that.

reply.text: Something caught your eye, Commander? In any case, thanks~

options.text: First cards, now volleyball! What can't you do?

reply.text: When the stakes are sufficiently high, there's no game I won't play!

150.text: I lay eyes upon a delectable manjuu. It is of the edible variety, no?

comments.text: Well, their fluffy form certainly does make them look like manjuu buns.
Ah-haha, nearly did I bite right into it. It is good I did not.
You're invited to try Akagi's manjuus. Of the bird variety.
Oho. A most peculiar food by the sound of it, but I am curious to taste it.
I recommend starting from the head and working your way down, hehe~

options.text: Et tu, brute?!

reply.text: Fret not. I only laid my eyes upon it, never sunk my teeth into it.

151.text: Think you can read MY poker face?

comments.text: Poker? Isn't that a game for grownups?! Î£(ï¾ŸÐ”ï¾Ÿ)
There's more than one thing only meant for adults in this image...
How long would it take for us to learn this "poker" game?
THAT type of poker requires a certain type of... adult mindset.
Hahah! I might know me a thing or two about card games! Let's see what you've got!
It's not limited to cards! Roulette, dice, slots, you name it, we can play it.
I see you've got an ace up your cleave. If that's not the perfect thing to distract the Commander with, I dunno what is.
Mhm~ I may still be learning the art of dealing, but it's little things like this that give you the house edge.

options.text: The same trick won't work on me twice!

reply.text: Hehe~ You're free to challenge me again whenever you like.

options.text: You're no ordinary poker player, I'll give you that much...

reply.text: Eyes on the prize, Commander. Whatever that might be~

152.text: #MaidForADay I learned so much thanks to Belfast and the Royal Maids!

comments.text: I must say, you are quite the fast learner, Marie. You'll be fit to serve Her Highness in no time if you continue your training.
I am very service-minded, being Lady Helena's servant, after all! However, I need to learn more about your peculiar Royal Navy customs.
It seems Belfast has a new apprentice.
Oh my gosh, Marie, you're just the cutest (*''â–½'')
Um, thank you, Edinburgh... I do appreciate the things you taught me, by the way. Like how to brew good tea, and so forth.
Just don't overload her with new things, Edinburgh.
Right, I won't... I do wish you could be a little more friendly, like Marie is.
Maid for a day? Sounds fun! Where do I sign up?
Talk to Belfast! She'll help you get started.

options.text: Sounds like you'd make a natural maid.

reply.text: Hehehe! It wasn't super serious maid training, but I still went all-out!

options.text: Is it just me, or does Belfast look unusually content?

reply.text: She was so earnest that I couldn't help but find her endearing.

153.text: We made a new friend and had a fun chat about ninjutsu.

comments.text: I know I chose this pose, but looking back at it now, it's a bit silly...
Really? I think the three of you look awesome together!
The honorable Kasumi and Kuroshio and I spoke, sharing ninja secrets with one another! I hope to do it again sometime!
I wouldn't call them secrets, but yeah, it was fun! I'd love to do it again too.
Why wasn't I invited? I've got some fun anecdotes to share as well.
You're absolutely invited to join us for the next meet! Let's mark our calendars for sometime this month.
Agreed. You are hereby cordially invited to our nin-chat-su party.
I echo this sentiment!

options.text: The ninjas are unionizing!

reply.text: Just gathering for a friendly exchange! Or at least, that's what we want you to think... *wink*

options.text: Now you just need matching uniforms.

reply.text: The ninja makes the uniform, not the other way around.

154.text: What do you think? Could I pass as a genuine shrine maiden?

comments.text: You certainly performed the shrine maiden dance just like one! I'm impressed.
I'm good at imitating and copying, so it was easy! Besides, you were great at teaching it to me.
You're such a good dancer, Honoka... I wish I could move like you do...
Practice makes perfect, Harutsuki! Want me to give you some tips?
Yes! Please do!
I'm so happy to have made friends with another potential shrine maiden!
And I'm so happy to have had an opportunity to hang out and practice with you Sakura Empire girls!

options.text: Easily, Honoka.

reply.text: Hehehe, really? Aww, you're making me blush~

options.text: Sounds like you all had fun.

reply.text: We did! Everyone I've met from the Sakura Empire has been so kind and friendly!

155.text: I spy with my little eye a Nagisa, rehearsing her lines!

comments.text: You took a photo of it too?! Geesh...
I just had to! You look all cute when you blush. Do you want me to delete it, though? If you don't like it...
A little late for that now... But you know what? It's fine.
If I may ask: lines for what?
Oh, well, I work as a stage actress. Stuff like this is just part of my job description.
And she's a heckin' good actress, I'll have you know!
It's one thing to say the lines on stage, but it's a bit weird when people listen to you practicing them...

options.text: Mind if I come and watch your rehearsal?

reply.text: Yes, I do. And if I catch you spying on me, you'll regret it, you silly dog!

156.text: Humans make such curious things. Be it this "cell-fee" gadget or that airborne metal bird.

comments.text: Mikasa says the same sorta stuff sometimes!
Oh? Does she, now?
Yeah, especially about airplanes. She still marvels over them every now and then.
Perhaps then she and I would make good acquaintances.
It is a wonder to witness the changing times, and with it, new generations taking the place of the old.
Ahah! Let us all get together and talk about it over some drinks! What do you say?
I do so wish to try your foreign spirits. Let us decide on a date in person.

options.text: You mean "selfie"? A cell-fee is a bail.

reply.text: That is how you spell it? Well, I would say I've taken quite the picturesque "selfie."

options.text: Man. I wish I could fly through the air.

reply.text: Quite. Had you wings of your own, I would take you on a journey you would late forget.

157.text: Woohoo! My fortune says I have a very lucky year ahead of me!

comments.text: Congratulations, Kasumi!
I envy you, Kasumi! If only Fusou and I didn't have such unfortunate pasts... We could've used some extra luck!
Hehe~ I would share mine if I could. At least that's all behind you now!
Is that supposed to be a big deal? I've gotten "exceptional luck" for as long as I can remember.
Gee, I wonder if that's because you just have stupidly good luck
You guys get good fortunes? My average one reads something like "disastrous misfortune"...
Oh dear... Don't worry! Luck is relative, so every instance of bad luck will be offset eventually!

options.text: Time to go buy a lottery ticket!

reply.text: Maybe I should! The stars seem pretty much aligned for it!

158.text: Wherever you end up, you can know one thing for sure: that the stars will be super pretty.

comments.text: Ah, stargazing, are we? The beauty of the cosmos is truly something to marvel at.
All those countless stars in an endless universe... Makes you feel tiny, doesn't it?
Wanna gaze together sometime? I'd love to learn all the constellations you have here!
Did you see any shooting stars?
I sure did! Lady Luck must really like me! (*_*) â˜†å½¡
Oh! I hope I'll get to see one someday...
Let's stargaze together! Lightning might not strike the same place twice, but maybe stars do!
I'd love to... You're so nice, Misaki!

options.text: Why not set a date for some group stargazing?

reply.text: Heck yeah! Stargazing Day, let's go!

options.text: Stargazing seems like it takes a lot of patience and skill.

reply.text: There's a few things you need to know, but it's not much more demanding than, say, fishing!

159.text: Literally setting up the christmas tree with the girls, pretty good if I do say so myself

comments.text: Wow! Nothing says "Christmas" like a huge Christmas tree! Nice job, everyone!
Sorry, what? I'm planting the star while you're taking a selfie!
Okay that's a fair point. Christmas only comes once a year though, gotta make some memories you know?
and there's the obligatory marblehead selfie. I was WAITING for it.
With me in the background about to lose my balance because SOMEONE isn't holding the ladder...
Omg I'm really sorry. If I take a slapping pic of you in your dress will that make up for it?
I'll pass. To be fair, you did the most work with the tree anyway. Just next time, hold the ladder, please...
You know what this tree is missing? Candy canes!
You know what else it could use? Gingerbread cookies!
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, it's the rocket decorations that this tree needs!
Gonna be more decoration than tree by the time y'all done with it lol

options.text: Strong contender for Christmas tree of the year.

reply.text: Hey thanks. Everyone in the Eagle Union dorm worked their butts off on this thing, and it shows.

160.text: I was just wrapping presents when this little guy jumped into the box!

comments.text: They can be a real handful sometimes... It didn't ruin your present, did it?
Nope, luckily! Wonder what made it hop inside... Maybe it was pining for its time inside a cat box?
Whatever it is, it's not normal. You should have Akashi examine it.
Not happening now that it's skittered off! I'm sure the little guy is fine anyway.
Adorbs. Classic meowfie. How's your presents btw? Coming along gud?
Yup, got done with wrapping just after I finished playing with officer meow-meow here!
You're not gifting someone a cat for Christmas, are you?
Hahahaha! If only! Everyone I know already has a meowfficer!

options.text: One might say you were wrapping... PURR-esents.

reply.text: Yeowch! Now that's an oof-inducing sucker PUNch!

161.text: Look what I found. A Christmas ham in its natural habitat!

comments.text: WTF! I told you not to upload this! UGH!!
Aww, but you were so into it! "Ho-ho-ho! You'd best not be on Hammann's perverted idiot list, or you're getting a scolding for Christmas!"
Enough already! Delete this or Santa really will put you on his naughty list!
Lmao! Sister, I was born on the naughty list â€“ molded by it!
You're volunteering to be Santa this year? Aww, what a diligent girl you are~
Just trying it on, that's all... Just wondering: how do I look? Not too bad I hope...
No, not at all. It fits you perfectly!
You really think so?? Oh thank goodness! Thanks!!

options.text: You look to be in the holiday mood too, Sims.

reply.text: Call me Santa's little prankster!

options.text: That's the prettiest ham I've ever seen.

reply.text: What kind of compliment is that?? It definitely doesn't make me happy! Nuh-uh!

162.text: Dear santa: here are milk and cookies, now gib steak and drumsticks! Good night!

comments.text: Did you seriously draw and put up a picture of a drumstick? Is meat all you ever think about?
Father Christmas will surely get a laugh out of it! I certainly did!
I have a feeling like Yuudachi's wish will come true. Let's wait and see.
GUESS WHAT! Just found a nice fat drumstick in my stocking! Suck on that, non-santa believers!
Santa Claus always rewards girls and boys who have been good throughout the year.
I'm gonna be a good dogger next year too if there'll be a reward waiting for me!!

options.text: Being good pays off.

reply.text: Indeed it does. What about you, Commander? Have you been good this year?

163.text: Oh what fun it is to ride on a one-hundred horse-power sleigh! â™ªâ™¬â™ª

comments.text: Delivering presents in mad style!
It's a shame to see the reindeer go, but this upgraded sleigh is stunning in its own right.
Dashing through the snow... I'd probably be laughing all the way too.
Reindeer just don't cut it anymore! If you wanna meet the present quota, you gotta go real fast!
Blazing across snow-topped banks under the moonlight... This gives me inspiration.
It's a bumpy ride on this bad boy, but it can traverse just about anything! Perfect for my needs!
Sounds like my tinkering did the trick. Stellar.
Sure did! You've got a magic touch with these things.

options.text: Houston, we have liftoff...

reply.text: Briefly, just went over a bump. I'm 8-ish reindeer short of a sleigh that can actually fly.

options.text: Aren't you freezing, wearing just that?

reply.text: The temperature is cold, but my outfit is hot, so it balances out.

164.text: Candy canes, lollipops, gingerbread! Christmas candy is the sweetest! (â‰§â–½â‰¦)

comments.text: Don't forget Christmas cake, milk and cookies, and pecan pie! We're only scratching the surface of the candy iceberg!
Oh boy, I'm starting to feel a sugar crash coming on...
Tell me about it... Someone else play the role of Saint Nicholas while I take a nap...
Remember: brush your teeth after eating candy, or the Plaqinator will send his cavity creeps after you!
Eep! You're right... Wouldn't want my sweet tooth to develop into a rotten tooth!
Lamest supervillain ever...

options.text: Now you've got me craving sweets.

reply.text: Well... We're out of candy, but if you wanna eat something sweet, there's always me...

165.text: The kotatsu's warmth seeps into my being... and now, I don't want to get out.

comments.text: First time? The kotatsu meme is not just a baseless anime trope~
We must not fall for such temptations! Let us brave the cold outdoors â€“ together!
If eating tangerines under the kotatsu is wrong, then I don't wanna be right~ Join the comf party, RJ~
My conviction is being tested... Will I persevere, or give in to sloth? To be continued...!
That's how it gets you~ Once you slide your legs in, you won't ever want to leave.
It seems not just the heart desires warmth, but also the body...
The Queen of the North is dead! Long live the Queen of the Kotatsu!
I will return to my frozen throne soon. Just... 5 more minutes...

options.text: The kotatsu claims yet another victim!

reply.text: Indeed... But you know its warmth too, do you not, Commander? I take solace in that fact.

options.text: Mmm, yummy tangerines.

reply.text: Ah, yes, the tangerines were excellent. Thank you for bringing them, Commander.

166.text: Osechi will be available today at the cafeteria.

comments.text: WHOA! I'll be there faster than you can say kamaboko!
The Royal Maids, and Miss Hiei who gave us guidance, welcome you to partake in the feast.
All I did was offer a morsel of my experience. It is the Royal Maids who deserve all the praise.
And might I ask what "osechi" is?
A beautifully-assembled collection of traditional Sakura Empire foods eaten around New Year's.
Well, why didn't you just say so in the first place! I think I will give it a try!
Exemplary work, Belfast! Show the world that no cuisine is too complex for our maids!
You honour us, Your Majesty. We shall gladly prepare any dish you wish us to.

options.text: Hey, leave some for me too!

reply.text: But of course, Master. We have already set aside a helping just for you.

167.text: Has anyone yet to receive their New Year's gift?

comments.text: Thanks for the gift, Amagi! Most of it will go to Pooky's food budget, but hey.
Be sure to treat Pooky to the best pet food you can find.
Aren't these usually given to friends and family? Why'd I get one?
Because you are like family to Akagi. That makes you like family to me.

options.text: Can I get one too?

reply.text: But of course, Commander. You need only come and claim it at your leisure.

options.text: Guess what? I have one for you!

reply.text: Oh, one for little old me? You're too kind, Commander~

168.text: I got a New Year shark from a nice Sakura Empire lady. Raaaawr!

comments.text: U-110 seemed to really like my shark-print envelope.
it's so good! I'm gonna show it off to all my friends!
Aww, ain't that cute? Wish I'd gotten one with an albacore print
It so happens I have a little surprise for you. Come see me when you have time.
Wait, for realsies?! Whoa... I'm not used to being on the receiving end of surprises!
you could set up a commission system and make bank off of this.

options.text: Are those great whites or tigers?

reply.text: they're shaaarks. guraaawr.

options.text: I've also got a gift that'll make your jaws drop.

reply.text: you do? is it something sharky, or a swirly-whirly?

169.text: Pooky and I wish you a happy New Year!

comments.text: Happy New Year, Suzutsuki! Soon spring will be upon us.
Yup yup! It'll be warm again before long.
I hope the next year will be... well, better. Of course, I'd always say that, but after this one especially...
The darkest hour is just before the dawn! Don't worry.
I'm still waiting for it to be year of the cat!
good luck with that one lmao
I know there's no such thing, DUH! I'm just saying!

options.text: Pooky sure is one cute furball of joy.

reply.text: Hehe! I like to think I am, too! Minus the fur.

options.text: Happy New Year to you too!

reply.text: Thanks! Have a good one, Commander!

170.text: First sunrise of the year. First water drawn. First cup of coffee brewn.

comments.text: What's so special about drawing water for the first time of the year?
"Wakamizu" it's called. The first scoop of water of the year is meant to be holy, according to folklore.
Someone's cultured. Unlike Hipper, who spent New Year's Day sleeping in.
AND WHOSE FAULT IS THAT?! I was up all night, listening to your drunken rambling!
I love the smell of fresh coffee in the morning.
Couldn't agree more. Watching the sun rise, a cup of PharisÃ¤er in hand... That's the dream.
I can do without the "waking up early to catch the sunrise" part, personally.
See â†‘THISâ†‘, Eugen? And when *I* do it, it's wrong?!

options.text: Early to bed, early to rise, huh?

reply.text: The early bird catches the worm, after all. Or in this case, the sunrise.

options.text: Speaking of coffee, I need me a cup...

reply.text: Don't overwork yourself now, Commander. Enjoy the holidays for once.

171.text: This one's New Year dream bodes well... for the year ahead of us...

comments.text: A mountain, an eagle, and an aubergine... I'd say it doesn't get much more auspicious than that!
From this one, to all... may fortune smile upon you...
I dreamt about an army of Pookies! Wonder what that symbolizes...
I dreamt I turned into an army of San Diegos and graced everyone with my smarts!
Kasumi saw dozens upon dozens of Foos in the dream world...
Your dreams... they all seem so interesting to this one...
And... what if you didn't have a dream? Like, at all? Is that a bad sign?
Not at all... It bodes a year of peace and calm... You need not worry...
Whoa, really?! That's a load off my back! Thank you, Shinano!

options.text: Happy (sleepy) New Year!

reply.text: Grateful is this one... May spring grace all of us shortly...

172.text: The Z-class all got together and we wrote down our New Year's wishes!

comments.text: When there's a million things you wish for, it ain't easy deciding on just one
That's why you needed more time? Geesh.
One plaque for one wish just ain't enough for the one and only Lebe, y'know
You are just greedy. I suggest simply wishing for world peace.
Only sheeple make wishes! The Fiend of the Crimson Darkness seizes what she desires with her own hands!
So... you're a sheeple, then? You wrote down a wish too.
Indeed. I believe it went: "I wish to never have to do homework again."
The both of you, that is so rude! Peeping toms! Spies!

options.text: I feel you, Lebe. It's not easy.

reply.text: It's tough, I tell you... Heard it's called "decision fatigue" when you get tired of trying to decide on one of many things

173.text: Bought this thing called an "omamori" while on a shrine visit.

comments.text: You're gonna have to explain what that means.
It's basically a Sakura Empire amulet! Some promise good luck, others ward off evil spirits. I bought one for you too.
Oh really? That's cool, thanks!
Got any for me~?
Funny you ask, cause I do. I got you one that promises academic success.
Question is: do they even do anything?
Kinda! The more you believe in them, the more you subconsciously work toward the thing you want ^^
So it's a self-fulfilling prophecy kind of deal? Interesting...
I've got some for you gals too! These promise fortune, in both meanings of the word.

options.text: Blue head to toe. You look great.

reply.text: Thanks! You're a real looker yourself, you know.

174.text: Whew. It's been a hectic, but fulfilling day!

comments.text: Your hard work is greatly appreciated! Thank you for all your help.
It was nuts... You serve one customer then two more queue up right after...
But hey, that's funding for the shrine's foreseeable future secured at least!
Great work, nya! The gods will be very pleased with our sales report, nya!
As will your investors, I'm sure.
We would've been overwhelmed with visitors without Chiyoda's and Chitose's help!
Just glad we could return the favor. You've helped us plenty before.
Akashi did compensate us too, so there's that... Hope it won't be so busy next time...

options.text: Hats off to you for going above and beyond.

reply.text: Thanks! We're always happy to help at the shrine.

175.text: Mmm! I don't know what "shiruko" or "zouni" actually are, but boy do they smell delish!

comments.text: I can tell you one thing they have in common: they both have mochi in them!
Really? Hmm... My stomach's only got room for one, so question is: which?
my suggestion: have one of them now, then save the other for dinner. how's that?
Ooh, that's a good idea! TrÃ¨s bien!
I've heard of mochi. It's one of the Sakura Empire's confectionary staples, no?
Your sweets sense is tingling, huh~? Will we see a Sakura Empire x Iris Libre cuisine crossover soon?
me, I'll just have the zouni as-is. I'm hungry.
Aha! I had a feeling you were more of a zouni person!

options.text: Next time, we could have one each.

reply.text: As good an idea as any, Commander! Just watch out for New Year's excess.

options.text: Can't have a Sakura Empire New Year without mochi.

reply.text: And heaps of it, too! You can add it to almost anything!

176.text: Lucky Laugh is harder than one might think.

comments.text: The sillier it looks, the better! That's the point of the game :)
I will admit, I did crack a smile upon seeing my own creation.
meh, it's a good game and all but I know a better one: pin the tail on the akagi
Oh, I know a better one yet: pin a dagger through the vermin's heart! Any volunteers~?
Let's try something a little less violent. Truth or dare might be your thing, Akagi.
Splendid idea! I will arrange a private truth or dare session with the Commander at once!

options.text: Heh. You got pretty close, though.

reply.text: As did you. I never took you for one with such good intuition.

177.text: Ugh... Feels like there's a maelstrom brewing in my stomach...

comments.text: Are you all right, dear? I warned you about eating too much.
Well, what's done is done. Can't blame her for gorging herself on Hiei's next-level cooking.
Exactly... You blink and suddenly you've wolfed down 3 whole servings...
Oh dear... I suggest eating some nanakusa-gayu to aid digestion. It is the season for it, after all.
Thanks, Doc... I'll have some of that. This time, one serving only...
Yeah I'm kinda feelin it too...
Have you ever tried not inhaling your food, dumb dog?

options.text: Gluttony might be a sin, but oh is this relatable.

reply.text: We're stomach pain buddies... Now let's both learn from our mistakes...

options.text: Nanakusa-gayu? Tell me more.

reply.text: Ah, it's a type of rice porridge with 7 types of herbs, traditionally eaten around the 7th of January.

178.text: I've been told these balls are not suited for playing dodgeball. Is this true?

comments.text: Well, no... Temari, as they're called, are probably not the best for playing dodgeball, or any ball game.
You don't dribble or toss em around, you hold onto em for good luck! C'mon, you should know this!
I was today years old when I learned that temari truly are not suited for ball games.
Do I look like I give a damn? No! I'll play fetch solo if I have to!
What next, you gonna move into a doghouse and bark at stray cats?
HAH! You might think you're so smart but I'm way ahead of you!

options.text: Just imagine how much effort goes into a temari.

reply.text: Maybe that is part of the reason why they shouldn't be thrown around.

options.text: I'll put dodgeballs on the requisition list.

reply.text: You will? Superb! It would be great if you could join us for a match, Commander.

179.text: The Sakura Empire's got sweet drinks for New Year's. Bottoms up.

comments.text: Do you mean "sweet" literally? Are you having amazake, by any chance?
sounds like it! sure it's okay for her to drink that though?
It's got really low ABV so I wouldn't worry.
Really low ABV? Well, I don't mean to be a stereotype, but... Heresy!
Call me a heretic then but this stuff is GOOD.
Just don't have too much of it, all right?

options.text: I'll drink to that.

reply.text: Way ahead of you, comrade Commander.

options.text: Sounds a bit like rice porridge.

reply.text: Uh-huh, but in drinkable form. That's more my style.

180.text: Tossing dice puts me in the mood for some high-stakes cee-lo!

comments.text: Can we just NOT gamble and play Momopoly like normal people?
Oh cmon Suruga! Don't be so low-energy!
Cee-lo, you say? I have some time to kill. Why not.
That's what I want to hear! Let's go babyyyy!
I didn't agree to this! You said we were going to play Momopoly!
Kii's the dealer? All right, I'm in! Been ages since our last game
Would you PLEASE read the comments? Momopoly! NOT cee-lo!

options.text: A literal dice roll... I mean, sure.

reply.text: Feel like joining us, Commander? We'll wait for you.

options.text: Did someone say Momopoly? I'm game!

reply.text: Thank you, Commander. At least YOU'RE in favor of sticking to the agreed-upon plan!

181.text: It's New Year's, you know what that means! Our annual game of Poetry against Humanity!

comments.text: Always fun to play! The eye strain from looking at the same cards all day, not so much, though...
I had excellent cards, and I still came last! How?! Am I cursed with bad card luck?
Even the best cards are no good if added to a verse where they don't fit, Akatsuki.
Poetry against Humanity? That's quite different from the card games I'm used to...
Hanafuda, poker, and PaH ultimately boil down to one thing: it's all about how you play your cards!
A bit of an oversimplification... Though Souryuu is kind of better than me at card games across the board...

options.text: DesDiv 6, all together in one place!

reply.text: As we always said we would be! We are bound by an eternal connection!

options.text: Fill in: Akatsuki's ____ is her ____.

reply.text: Sense of direction, cause of genuflection.

182.text: Actually, being kagami mochi is fine~

comments.text: I've heard of Long Island iced tea, but Long Island mochi's a new one...
Just don't eat me, I'm only a spooky-slash-festive decoration~
my brain says no, but my stomach says yes (Âºï¹ƒÂº)
You shouldn't play with food. Or pretend to be food either.
It's not the real thing, just a comfy cushion that looks like it~
Oh. Never mind, carry on then...
Where can I buy one for myself?
Reckon it's bout time someone told ya what we do with kagami mochi...
There's more to it than putting it up just as a decoration?
Yeah well... See, come jan 11th they've turned hecking hard, so then we take a big ol hammer n crack em open.
NOOOOO I DON'T WANNA BE MOCHI ANYMORE!

options.text: Promise you won't destroy NY City with your puffiness.

reply.text: Don't worry, nobody would choose this as the form of their destructor~

183.text: Behold! Thor's hammer; the MjÃ¶lnir! I jest, of course. It is an ordinary hammer.

comments.text: What's it for? Some Sakura Empire tradition? If so, where do I sign up?
As Shouhou explained to me, it is part of their custom called "kagamibiraki." It is for smashing mochi.
Why wouldn't a knife just cut it? No pun intended...
It's smashed to symbolize leaving the old year behind you. Cutting it into pieces wouldn't be the same thing.
Now that's what I call a recipe for a smashing time! Can I bombard it too?
I estimate a >75% probability that you're only joking, sister, but just in case: doing so would vaporize it.
Don't do iiit! What has the poor mochi ever done to you?
I'm sorry, little one. The deed is already done.
No amount of Sanity potions will help Long Island recover from that one...

options.text: Mochi, what happened? Mochi?! MOCHIIIII!

reply.text: The mochi is inanimate, Commander. You are being silly.

options.text: Bananas and mochi are both fated to be split, huh.

reply.text: As is tradition. Some things were never meant to be in one piece.

comments.text: Who started a fire?! Someone get an extinguisher!
There is no need to worry. This is just sagichou â€“ a paper burning festival, part of our New Year traditions.
Oh, my apologies, then. I just assumed something was up, based on Izumo's reaction.
Sorry about that. My body just locks up when I see fire...
Look at the intensity of those flames! The night is sure to be pleasantly warm.
Let us not forget to collect the ashes and scatter them about the dorm later. Doing so is said to bring good health.

options.text: So, the bonfire is lit...

reply.text: As long as it stays under control, it's all well and good...

options.text: "Sagichou." It's got a nice ring to it.

reply.text: There are many theories as to the word's origin. Stop by and I'll tell you some of them, Commander!

185.text: We're working on decorations for the Lunar New Year!

comments.text: You're splitting the workload, I presume? You need a lot of decorations for LNY.
Yep! Ning draws them and I hang them up!
not particularly exciting for a juustagram post... anyway, I assure you, we're hard at work.
Do you need help? I see your hand slipped on that bottom right stroke...
oops, yeah... it was just a cramp. we'll manage!

options.text: I still think it looks really good.

reply.text: really? you can thank Ying Swei for that. she taught me how to do it.

186.text: It's time to start the cat ear revolution (*Î¦Ï‰Î¦*)

comments.text: Ooh! Ooh! Do Belfast first!
Don't you want a cute pair of your own too? :3
Umm... I'll decide after I see how they look on Belfast! ^_^;
Aww! But they'd look great on mew~!
Well, if they're free of charge, I suppose they might come in handy some day.
They're not just free, they're mandatory~ >:3
Haha! I'll take a pair if you don't mind.
All yours, Neptune~! Heck, take several and give them to your friends~

options.text: As long as it's achieved by peaceful means!

reply.text: Of course~ Now don't you wanna try on a pair, Owner? :3

options.text: Am I at risk for being... revolutionized?

reply.text: If you're asking if I have a set of ears reserved for you, the answer is... YES :3

187.text: Look! Aren't my new friends adorable?

comments.text: With an army of these, you could conquer the great frozen tundra.
An army of cute little snowmen, you say? I'm on it!
What're those red things they've got on their blobby little necks?
Just a little something to keep them balanced (and loyal)! Cute, right?
Nice. I made a snow ÐºÑ€Ð¾Ð»Ð¸Ðº.
Wh-what does milk "do" to you? I just have a bottle or two after a bath...

options.text: A collar is, let's say, a "novel" item to put on a snowman...

reply.text: I've got normal-sized ones too! Interested in trying one out, Commander?

188.text: Just chilling and waiting for the gang to show up~

comments.text: You hanging out with Astoria today?
Plus a few others! By the way you checked out the latest edition of fashion d'azur yet?
Fashion d'Azur? Can't say I have. Usually I just consult you when I need fashion advice.
Didn't expect to spend the whole afternoon chatting about fashion. Let's do it again next time you're free!
Ayy, time flies. I'm free whenever so just hit me up when you are
Astoria's into fashion too huh. Almost starting to feel like the odd one out here.
You're missin out bigtime Balti. Why not join us for the next meetup? It'll be fun!
Hm... I'll think about it.

options.text: They still sell that tea? Thought the hype around it died down.

reply.text: Kinda, but the drink survived! Some places are putting out new flavors too so they're making a small comeback

options.text: Where is this place in the photo? Looks comfy.

reply.text: It's rated 4.7 stars for a reason! I'll DM you the address later so you can check it out

189.text: A refined lady fusses over the details, including, but not limited to, her nails.

comments.text: Interesting... So that's what I need in order to blossom! I see, I see!
There are many ways to ladydom, GB. This is just one. Would you like to know more?
In fact, yes, I would! Please be my guiding lady, Pola!
Pola's always been really good at painting nails, both her own and mine. Thanks for the nail art, by the way.
You're welcome, sis. It's always a pleasure to work with your hands.

options.text: You could open a nail salon with your level of skill!

reply.text: Oh please, I'm only an enthusiast. And besides, my other skills have more relevancy at the moment~

options.text: Nail art? Sounds like more than a single-color coating.

reply.text: It is. Nail art can get quite intricate and colorful. Would you like to give it a try, Commander~?

comments.text: I was NOT expecting Above Average Joe to vanquish Thanatos with a punch to the face! Like, just a regular right hook!
That's why his character is so good! He doesn't need OP powers, he wins using only his wits and unpredictability!
Yeah! And how he had to pick up his father's mantle, figuratively and literally, that really spoke to me.
Did they really have to keep the camera moving like, constantly? My head was spinning by the end of the film...
Sorry, I'd forgotten the director is kind of infamous for that. I'll find a film with gentler camerawork for next time!
Could we vote on what film to watch instead? I know of a fascinating Saratoga documentary that Gridley made.
Isn't that a little niche? I say we find a film we can all enjoy!
I kinda spaced out near the film's start middle and end but the potato chips were good!
That's fine too. Feel free to stop by again next time!

options.text: New life goal: vanquish a Siren by punching it.

reply.text: Hahaha! Maybe someday, Commander. Anyone can be a hero with the right mindset!

options.text: Best movie I've seen in ages!

reply.text: Right?! The scene where he comes back from the brink of death is pure kino!

191.text: After hearing so much about this signature Dragon Empery dish, today, I finally tried hot pot.

comments.text: It was an honor to get to prepare it for you, Miss Richelieu. How did you like it?
It was excellent. Enlightening, even. It gave me a look into a whole other world of cuisine.
Though certainly appetizing, isn't mutton prepared in this manner highly unorthodox?
What is unorthodox varies by culture. More than this I cannot say... other than that it is very spicy.
We'll have a great get-together soon, with lots of hot pot on the menu. You're free to join us and try it for yourself, Jeanne d'Arc!

options.text: You can tell it's spicy just from the pic alone!

reply.text: It truly is. You feel the heat not just on your tongue, but through your whole body! It is an intense experience.

options.text: Hot pot sounds like a good remedy to winter chills.

reply.text: It is quite warming, but take care not to overeat it. Your stomach will thank you later.

comments.text: Nothing soothes the soul quite like cuddling cute kitties does.
my soul would've been more soothed if you hadn't forced me to come along. just saying.
You say that, but you sure seemed to be enjoying yourself, snuggling with those cats.
i didn't snuggle anything, they lied down next to me, that's all.
That cafe is heaven on earth! I wanna see that black kitty again!
Let's visit it again then. How about next week?

options.text: Makes me wish I had a cat.

reply.text: Why not get one then? There's space in your office, isn't there? Hehehe~

options.text: They might be even cuddlier than Meowfficers are.

reply.text: I can vouch for the fact that they are. But don't take my word for it, why not go and see for yourself?

193.text: Dumplings are an essential part of the #SpringFestival

comments.text: We helped make them! And taste-tested a few too!
I told you a million times, Ping... you're not supposed to eat raw, unstuffed dumplings.
But my stomach was growling like a Nian beast! Plus, they were yummy as-is!
I admire how you can mold dumplings into all kinds of different shapes, Yat Sen. All I can make are regular, boring ones...
Don't beat yourself up over it. At least you do better than Chao Ho.
Hey, rude! I can do it if I just concentrate, okay?
Hehe, I wonder who'll be the lucky taster of my spicy surprisy ghost pepper dumplings!
Your WHAT?! Chang Chun, get over here RIGHT NOW!

options.text: They're tricky to fold just the right way. Takes skill.

reply.text: Indeed they are, but you're quite good at it, Commander!

options.text: Dinner can't come fast enough! Need dumplings!

reply.text: You said it! I'm so hungry I could eat a dumpling horse!

194.text: Did someone say FIRECRACKERS?! Watch out, port city, it's gonna be a loud night!

comments.text: Once you crackle and pop, you can't stop!
Aw yeah! And that barrel-size firecracker you set off at the end was amazing!
It was really pretty. But also tremendously loud... like thunder struck right next to us.
Hey, you can't make a firecracker omelet without almost cracking a few ear drums!
It's only a matter of time before you get hurt if you keep making these colossal firecrackers...
I'm not dumb! I know how to dive for cover! And don't pretend like you don't enjoy watching it go off!
Look, it's called supervision! If I don't keep an eye on you, then who will?

options.text: Just good, clean, explosive fun!

reply.text: Yeah! Besides, we're trained in the use of naval cannons, so what harm can a few firecrackers do?

options.text: What's a festival without firecrackers, right?

reply.text: This! It's like popcorn without salt! You need a bit of (read: a lot of) bang-bang!

195.text: Sweet are these nuggets, gelatinous their skin. Their chewy casings cover the delectable contents within.

comments.text: Aren't those tangyuan? That dessert they eat during holidays in the Dragon Empery?
They seem almost... magical! I must have one!
I know but one truthâ€“the sublime flavor of these forbidden fruits.
Isn't that tangyuan... glowing? And quite a lot, at that?
I don't think food in general is supposed to glow!
Food serves one purpose: to satiate hunger. The light is my respect for the meal, manifested.

options.text: So, is this your glowing recommendation for tangyuan?

reply.text: Its savor must be experienced, not described. A taste shall enlighten you.

comments.text: Wow! Looks dangerous, but fun!
Depends on the slope and your experience but yeah! Give it a go, Kent!
that's me on the left there. never found any new pets among the snow, but skiing was wunsy-funsy
You were looking for pets on a snowy mountain? Are you even allowed to have pets? I have so many questions...
Aw yeah, that mountain's good for skiing. And snowmobiling! Shoulda seen me yesterday!
First skateboarding, now snowmobiling? What sports AREN'T you good at, Minny?

options.text: Skiing is good and all, just be careful!

reply.text: It's perfectly safe, don't worry. This was just a beginner's course!

options.text: Putting that winter gear to good use, I see.

reply.text: Always have! Not every day I get to use it on land though!

197.text: I'm knitting a sweater for Master, made with love...

comments.text: Whereas I'm incapable of knitting even a scarf! Truly, I am a pitiable maid deserving of punishment!
It's no big deal. I can't knit, heck, most people here can't.
I'm confident that the commander will recognise the effort that went into your craft, no matter what you make.
You have quite the knack for knitting, don't you, Dido?
My ability still pales in comparison to yours...
Hah, Sirius looks like a wee cat playing with a baw of yarn.
What a naughty kitty...

options.text: I feel warmer just looking at this picture.

reply.text: A direct reply from Master!! You're too kind to me! Thank you, thank you, thank you so much, Master!!!

198.text: This is a public service announcement! Eat fruit! The fresher, the better!

comments.text: I'm with you on that one. Fruit is good for your health and protects you from malnourishment and disease.
Like scurvy! You don't wanna know what it does to you, just eat fruit rich in vitamin C!
What about fruit juice? Doesn't that work just as well? :3
I suppose? It isn't precisely the same thing, but it's fine as long as it's freshly squeezed.
Pardon, but did you take these fruits from the kitchen, by any chance? It is to be served later tonight.
I'm making a point here! Don't stress the details.

options.text: You could make a juicy fruit salad out of these.

reply.text: Sure. Whatever gets the fruit down your gullet at the end of the day.

options.text: An apple a day keeps the doctor away, as they say.

reply.text: It's true! Combine that with a balanced diet and you're set.

199.text: Whew! A bottle of cold milk after a hot bath always hits the spot~

comments.text: Milk, huh. Milk... I guess you really are what you eat -_-
I'm... milk? I don't see what you mean...
Is THIS what milk does to you?! This is simply ridiculous! How long have you been drinking it for?!
Wh-what does milk "do" to you? I just have a bottle or two after a bath...
I smell money to be made, nya! @Shiranui Place an order for 50 crates of milk, nya!
Perhaps we should invest in dairy farm stocks as well... This could be a big market, green cat.

options.text: Milk is nice, and so is its source... Hummina hummina...

reply.text: Pardon? Huh... Would you like me to bring you some milk, Commander? It's good for your bones!

200.text: Aw yeah, this came out lookin nice!

comments.text: Now that it's actually up on Juustagram it feels just like, kind of weird... a little childish idk.
Don't say that. You look cute together.
Thanks! Wanna make it a group photo and pose with us, Mogami?
Thanks, but I'll pass. I'll ask Mikuma if she wants to go instead though.
Childish?? Yoooo what are you talking about you both look sooo cute! @Baltimore let's take a photo like this rn!
What? Now?! I'd need time to prepare!

options.text: This pic has a certain ying-yang quality to it.

reply.text: Hey yeah I see what you mean! Almost makin me feel like a palette swap here lol

options.text: I never knew Suzuya liked lollipops.

reply.text: It's mainly just for the photo, although I do like having one every now and then.

201.text: Lovely signorinas and exquisite food. My two biggest vices. They combo quite well, too!

comments.text: The dinner party was splendid, Miss Littorio. Thank you so much for inviting us.
No, signorina, thank YOU for coming. I always cherish our time together.
Sardegnian food never disappoints! And neither did our gracious host!
I would've loved to indulge myself in all the delicacies on offer, but a lady must watch her calorie intake...
I'm glad to hear it. Your gratitude makes all my efforts worth it.

options.text: Wining and dining is a tried and tested strategy!

reply.text: Indeed, and I consider myself an expert at it. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?

202.text: The commander's chair is mine! You must all get into the ******* robot! (Don't take this seriously.)

comments.text: Hey, that's definitely Comrade Commander's chair! But... where's Comrade Commander?
No longer in office, that's where.
WHOA WHAT?!
Which is to say, out in the harbor. I just seized the opportunity to take an amusing photo.
I don't like where this is going...
I Am (Not) A Four-Eyes.
This isn't a coup, is it? I'm allergic to power struggles.
I think it's just Belorussiya having a little fun.

options.text: There's more to my job than just sitting in a chair.

reply.text: Perhaps, but it's a big part of it. You should get out more often. I'll keep your seat warm while you do.

options.text: Being the commander comes with great responsibility.

reply.text: And with great authority! Allow me to wield it, and I won't disappoint you!

203.text: I like to treat myself and my comrades to a beer now and then.

comments.text: Thanks for the drinks. That wasn't a half-bad evening at all.
Then how about we do it again sometime? I'd love to chat some more about guitars and music.
Aww, look, Hipper's made a friend. Now just don't flip your lid and lose her.
I have PLENTY of friends and I NEVER flip my lid, thank you very much!
Thought the cliche was that Northern Parliament folks only drank vodka?
Scharnhorst, please. That's only a stereotype. We don't drink only bier, do we?
Bier is too weak. I need something with more kick to it.
Variety is the spice of life. You need weak drinks to contrast strong drinks with!

options.text: Who doesn't love a cold one after a day's work?

reply.text: You included, I hope. Try to make it for the next meet, would you?

options.text: Heh, a classic beer mustache.

reply.text: Didn't notice it until after we took the photo. Although I'd rather have that than a beer belly!

204.text: Who's a good one-tailed girl? You are, yes you are~

comments.text: ADORABLE! I wanna pat her too~
She scuddled off back into the wild shortly after. I hope we'll meet again though~
The port's vicinity is home to surprisingly many critters. I wonder if we're allowed to have pets.
If not, I can make do with just meeting a new cute critter each day~
So cute... Tashkent has a fever, and the only prescription is lots of fluffing.
Me too. I'm powerless to resist the urge to fluff.
You could each fluff one of my tails, if you'd like!

options.text: I, too, need some fluffing right now.

reply.text: Hehe, no surprise there! You're a fluffaholic through and through, aren't you, Commander~?

options.text: You managed to tame a snow fox, just like that?

reply.text: Yep! They'll gladly let you pat them if you just show that you're friendly.

205.text: Check out what I made! Pretty good, right? ( â€¢ Ì€Ï‰â€¢Ì )âœ§

comments.text: Is that your raccoon? That's pretty cool.
Yup, yup! I'm really proud of how it turned out!
You should enter a snow sculpture competition. I bet you would take home first prize~
You like playing in the snow too? Oh boy! Let's make a snowman and have a snowball fight!
Sounds good! Bring all your friends too!
New objective identified. Planning construction of snow sculpture.
