That stool doesn't look very stable. Be careful so you don't fall.
Alas, I have already fallen...
You deserve a treat for your work. I made another large batch of pastries today and I'll bring some to you later.
Thank you! You're too kind.

options.text: Slow and steady wins the race. No need to rush.

reply.text: My limits exist to be pushed. I will complete my task as quickly as possible... within the realm of efficiency.

options.text: Wait, you fell? Are you okay?

reply.text: Forgive me, making you worry was not my intention. I am fine.

437.text: La-la-laaa, grow up big and strongâ™ª

comments.text: I'm glad to see you're taking such good care of the flowers.
Yeah I've been doing gardening training, but I'm not sure if I'm doing everything right.
You're doing fine. If you have any questions about flowers, I'm always happy to answer them.
Just don't wear yourself out from training too hard, okay?
I'm very curious who has been teaching her all these things.
The maids... They've taught me a lot.

options.text: There hasn't been any trouble during your training, has there?

reply.text: Why do you ask? What's it to you?

options.text: A+ for your outstanding work.

reply.text: Oh, thanks!

438.text: Welcome, dear customer! What drink would you like toâ€“ Oww! I bit my tongue...

comments.text: Take it easy. There's nothing to be so nervous about.
Right... Oww my tongue...
Are you okay? Shall I come and treat you?
No, it's alright. The pain will wear off quickly.
Aww, your two little assistants are so cute.
They really are... They're a big help too.
We should visit their store later. I've heard their food is fantastic.

options.text: Relax and take it slow.

reply.text: Okay, I'll try...

options.text: You're doing great. Keep it up.

reply.text: Thank you! I will!

439.text: Something good will happen if you wear one of these masks.

comments.text: There's so many of them! I'm SO gonna go on an adventure in your room later!
I suggest you reconsider. She knows what will happen through her divination.
Something good will happen? Are they like magical or something?
The bagua told me so.
Well if they said so then it must be right!
Can those masks improve your prospects with romance too?
Hmm... I'll have to ask the bagua again to do that.
So I need to pay you for the trouble, yes?
Oh, not exactly... Let's discuss it later in person.

options.text: "Something good" like what?

reply.text: You won't know until it happens.

options.text: You're giving out lucky masks? I'll have one!

reply.text: Sure thing. Just come by and it's yours.

440.text: This next move will put the game into a stalemate...

comments.text: So you intend to drag your opponent into a war of attrition?
It looks to me like she has another goal in mind.
I'm only playing to kill time. My strategy isn't that elaborate.
Ah, is this the game known as Go? I may not be able to beat the Commander at chess, but this on the other hand...
I'd be happy to show you how to play, if you're interested.
Splendid! In return, I'll teach you how to play chess.
No need. I'm content with just having an opponent to play!

options.text: We'll settle this once and for all... next time.

reply.text: I can hardly wait.

options.text: That game really dragged on, huh?

reply.text: Not at all. In fact, I would've loved to play with you a while longer.

441.text: Crank up the heat! Throw in the oil! Now stir and fry!

comments.text: Ruh roh... I'm getting a baaad feeling about that color!
Why do you say that Fu Shun? How bad can it be?
Is that what's for dinner tonight?
It sure is! Packs a hell of a punch too!
Damn that looks good! Can I join you for dinner? ^^
Absoloopalootely! We'd love to have you!
I'll get some stomach medicine... just in case.
ugh! this is what happens when you have too much drunken crab!
Nuh uh! I haven't eaten any!
yes you have! it's why you're acting this goofy!
If it makes her like this, why didn't you stop her?
cuz she loves drunken crab too much!

options.text: Mamma mia, that's a spicy stir-fry!

reply.text: It's meant to be! Spicy is good!

options.text: De-licious! I'll have seconds!

reply.text: Wow, I didn't take you for a spice junkie! Would you like some capsaicin extract with that?

442.text: if your name is called, are you brave enough to answer?

comments.text: Nope.
LOL
This some kinda game? I'm in!
aaand you're out! you got gobbled up by the gourd!
Huh? Why?
Hu Pen, you haven't actually called her name yet...
are you playing the golden horned king?
yeppers! are you brave enough to answer if your name is called?
hmm... no i don't think so.

options.text: Can it really swallow you whole?

reply.text: only one way to find out, right?

options.text: Will YOU answer if YOUR name is called?

reply.text: wait... did you find a more powerful gourd or something?!

comments.text: You managed to infiltrate the kitchen and nab that without being seen by Lung Wu? My hat's off to you!
Huzzah! I'm as sneaky as a snake!
Someone is getting banned from the kitchen. Again.
Noooo! Don't ban meeee!
Caught red-handed, and right by the kitchen sign...
saw Lung Wu running out with a spatula just a minute ago. praying for your safety!
Hmph! I'm not scared of her! Still gonna make a tactical retreat though!

options.text: You might want to delete the evidence.

reply.text: The biggest adventures deserve to be known far and wide! Also what evidence?

options.text: Be a good girl and apologize later.

reply.text: Fiiine.

444.text: Can the floral lantern make wishes come true?

comments.text: Why don't you make a wish and find out? It's worth a shot.
But none of my wishes ever come true...
Lunar New Year is a holiday even for the god of bad luck. I'm sure your wish will come true.
If things you want to come true don't, then you could make a wish you DON'T want to come true and it should work.
I see! That's what we call an exploit!

options.text: It's alright. I'll make the wish on your behalf.

reply.text: But then won't your wish not come true? Won't you be cursed with bad luck?

options.text: I'll make your wish come true instead.

reply.text: You're too kind, I don't deserve you...

comments.text: Mood...
Sounds like you just want an excuse to sleep more.
To hibernate is to sleep, so...
rolling round in bed just chilling out is a kind of hibernation
If you really want to hibernate then I recommend getting a kotatsu!
the heck is a kotatsu
A treacherous contraption that lures you in with its warmth. You won't even WANT to leave!
just looked it up and it's like a heated table basically? sounds cool

options.text: Worms in winter are cute.

reply.text: yea so if you wanna be cute you should hibernate too

options.text: Welp, we're not getting you out of that sheet anytime soon...

reply.text: ya so call off the rescue. im gonna absorb the sheets power and emerge from my cocoon in summer

446.text: Watching the flowers bloom while savouring a cup of tea. This is my treat after the photoshoot.

comments.text: That looks so relaxing.
It's different from the forest strolls I'm used to, but it's pleasant all the same. You should try it, Elder Centaur.
Drink hot tea on the porch of a pagoda? Certainly! Please tell me if you know any good spots!
Through the red towers, spring's fragrance blows. This photo encapsulates this idea.
Thank you for suggesting it to me, Elder Hai Tien. It smells lovely up here.
Aha! That's the perfect caption for this photo!

options.text: The plum blossoms look fantastic from this angle.

reply.text: They do, don't they? The view is simply stunning.

options.text: Be careful so you don't get petals in your cup.

reply.text: It's fine even if that were to happen. I think it would add to the flavour.

447.text: The boat is so wobbly... Fun!

comments.text: Iunno if literally rocking the boat is such a bright idea. That's dangerous.
It is?
She's a shipgirl for crying out loud. What's the worst that could happen?
shouldn't you deploy your rigging...
And utterly ruin the mood, you mean? Let her live.
Live? But I'm already living...

options.text: Did you have fun?

reply.text: Yup! Lots of fun! Thank you teacher!

options.text: Do you want to do something even more fun next?

reply.text: Yeah! More fun!

448.text: I've been told that gloves are a must, so...

comments.text: Damn you look good! Gift from the Commander, I'm guessing?
Yes, they were. You are asking about the gloves, right?
No, not the gloves!
that's the style of the season! you gotta great taste.
It was a gift, so it's not like my taste had any part in the matter.
Ornate, yet dignified. It's the perfect look for you. The Commander has good taste.
It's wonderful, but I wish the slit was a little further down.
I'd say it's right where it should be. Believe me on this.

options.text: Glad to hear you like it.

reply.text: More than just "like," I love it. Thank you so much!

options.text: Yes! Gloves are a must!

reply.text: Right...

comments.text: Such diabolic cuteness!
That's diabetes-inducing for sure!
That's an Arctic hare. Though it looks harmless, it's actually quite strong.
Strong, huh? I dunno, looks like a big ball of fluff I could just eat up!
I mean, they can jump 3 meters and run 60 kilometers an hour. It would be hard to catch.
You kidding me? It can move as fast as a cutting-edge carrier?!
Aww what a cute lil guy! Can I take him with me to Planet Bunny?
Planet Bunny? Where or what is that?
It's... a planet... out there in space...

options.text: Thanks, I have diabetes now!

reply.text: Me too. It's the entry fee to enjoy such cuteness.

options.text: I need more pics of this fluffy creature.

reply.text: I've sent more. Please check your direct messages.

450.text: Lookie lookie! I'm making hot soup!

comments.text: Stop! Stop!
Ognevoy listen to me!
Check your juustagram mentions!!!
THE POT! THE POT IS ABOUT TO BREAK!
Break? What do you mean?
Oh! The cracks, right? Those are just visual flair to make it look like a witch's cauldron!
That's my new Witch's Alchemy Pot(tm), nya! Come get your own at my store, nya.
Whoa whoa! You need to use a lid or the soup will all evaporate away!
I know! I'll put a lid on once I'm done stirring.
Oh. Okay. Carry on.
Feel free to come by later and help yourself to some.
Where's my bread? Everyone in front of me got free bread.
NO SOUP FOR YOU!
What are you talking about? The soup isn't even done yet.
I think they may be speaking in a code.

options.text: Just looking at it makes me feel warm inside.

reply.text: You'll feel even warmer when you eat it! I'll pour some into a thermos and bring it to you.

comments.text: Pardon my sudden reply, but I believe your chains can be rather deadly if used the wrong way.
Please consult the Port Safety Guidelines on Anchors and Chains to prevent injury to you and other persons.
Why, thank you for bringing it to my attention.
Noted. I'll bear safety in mind.
This is a very powerful selfie.
Damn right. We Ganguts produce nothing but powerful photos!
She's not going to drink with you just because you flattered her.
She's right. You'll have to look elsewhere for a drinking buddy.
Yes, you need to take good care of your chains and reins. If they break, you lose control.
So true. Maintain them well and they'll treat you well.
Exactly. Heheh.
I've read this exchange several times over and I still don't get it. Is this some kind of encrypted message?

options.text: Nice job. Those chains look as strong as anything.

reply.text: Yes, strong. Strong like the bond between us.

options.text: What do you USE the chains for?

reply.text: You'd be surprised how many uses they have. Want a demonstration? Then come visit me at my dorm room.

452.text: Watch out cause the fierce army is gonna getcha!

comments.text: PANIK! captain black bunny, bring the white bunny corps to the scene and restore order!
I'd like to see you try! My army's gonna mess you up svirepy style!
Where have I seen these before? Wait... Don't you make graffiti of these guys?
Bingo. This here is svirepy the 1st. Looks pretty sick huh?
That gives me an idea! Hang on, I'm gonna go make a da Vinci the 1st!
This sounds like a fun competition, and I will not be last! I'm off to make a Soobrazitelny the 1st!
Hey! Stop ripping me off! That name was MY idea!
Domain Expansion! Thy army hath been stopped in its tracks!
Hah. You think that's gonna stop me?
Check this shit out! Fierce army, group up and slam her with all you have!
Gah! Unbelievable... How can mere puppets be so strong?!
That's what you get! Surrender and we'll spare your life!

options.text: That's a fine army you've got.

reply.text: You should join us! Sign up and become svirepy the 3rd!

options.text: Who are you, and what is your goal?!

reply.text: The name's svirepy! My goal is total port conquest!

453.text: Officer Abercrombie is on patrol, keeping your lanes safe!

comments.text: Look at that wake! You gotta be going full throttle!
I could keep up with you on foot! Do you want to race with me?
You're on. Going faster than me is against the law, though!
Behave, now. I don't want to hear a word about you causing trouble for the Commander.
I know I know, granny Hood!
Be a good girl and I'll buy some sweets for you later.
Of course, ma'am! I'll be on my best behaviour!

options.text: Come in, Officer Abercrombie. Seen anything?

reply.text: Nothing out of the ordinary! Rest assured, the waters are safe under my watch.

options.text: Must be nice, feeling the wind in your hair.

reply.text: Yeah, it's lovely! You should come with me sometime. And hold my hand so you don't fall off!

454.text: Got my fit, got my props! Looking flawless if I say so myself!

comments.text: Police officer by day, phantom thief by night... You're playing a real two-sided character, aren't you?
Nice! You're nailing this role. Just need to polish up a few small things and you'll be perfect.
Oh yeah? Come to the studio and show me, please!
Sure. Terrible, you coming along?
I suppose so. I'll rendezvous with you later.
You remind me a bit of Sheffy...
I would like to make this clear: I am adept at infiltrating, not infiltrating in a disguise.
You may presume they are the same, but the two are worlds apart.
Ahah, I can tell you're strict about this stuff.
This is shaping up to be a movie whose ending you can't guess so easily.
Now I'm curious. I want spoilers.
You want spoilers? I got 'em!
No you don't! You haven't even read the script!

options.text: So it's you! YOU'RE PhantoM!

reply.text: Sure am! See me in the interrogation room and I'll tell you all about my second life.

options.text: Does playing 2 roles come with twice the pay?

reply.text: Ooh, I never thought about that. I should ask!

455.text: Searching the crime scene for clues. This is child's play for a detective like me.

comments.text: Are you filming a detective movie? That's so cool! All the props and outfits look spot-on!
No. It's going to be a movie about... Well, it's not so easy to summarise.
It will feature an intense firefight as well. You're going to love it.
And that's not all. It'll have helicopters and bazookas too.
Now I just HAVE to get tickets.
Wait, there was a robbery there?! I can't believe this happened right after I took my eyes off it...
Yes, it's awful luck. Do you know anything, Officer Sumner?
Only that the criminal is very skilled. We need to get back to the station and revise our security protocols, ASAP.
I see, I see! I've watched enough anime to know who did it!
There is always only one truth.
You're saying you are a better detective than I, Monarch? Prove it.

options.text: Nice outfit! It's really cool.

reply.text: You like it? That's good to hear. I suppose it's alright.

options.text: What if the thief sees this post?

reply.text: Then I have this to say: Resist and your sentence will be stricter. Give yourself up and it will be more lenient.

457.text: Is this SERIOUSLY how maids are like these days?!

comments.text: Isn't that magazine a little uh... sus?
I think your research may have taken you to strange places.
Some people quite fancy the things depicted in there.
Nubian, please put that down and come see me at once.
Yes ma'am!
I've seen that mag before but I don't remember when...
p sure thats "the 199 techniques of a maid" cuz i've got it too
I see, I see! This is what they call "yabai"!
Yabai really is the word.
What? What does that mean?!

options.text: What do you think you're reading?

reply.text: Uhh... a guidebook on modern maids? Something like that?

options.text: I know this mag. It's a good one!

reply.text: Is it really? I'll, uh, give it another read later!

458.text: Who doesn't love a warm meal served with a warm smile?

comments.text: What is this dish? Pufferfish milt sashimi in kombu dashi?
Nah it's eel jelly!
Oh. I never knew you could prepare eel that way.
Yes, Royal cuisine is very "innovative."
Ooh you must be pretty good at cooking! I've gotta start taking notes!
As must I.
You girls should totally teach me cooking too :3
Sure! Let's host a cooking class later this week!
I'm sure the Commander will love to see how that goes.

options.text: It's... visually striking, I'll say that.

reply.text: It's what I call cooking with creativity!

options.text: Go eel or go home!

reply.text: DAMN RIGHT! Eel is the way!

459.text: Nooooo there's a bug in my room! Pls halp! >_<

comments.text: hey @ShiningS your services are needed
Which would you prefer â€“ .44 or .50 calibre?
Um... neither. I don't need anything THAT lethal.
Sounds like you need my Pesticide X special formula, nya! One spray kills them all, nya!
Where there's one, there's always more.
Please don't say another word.
I think we should have a pest extermination week at the port.
Pest extermination week? Where do I sign up?
Yes, that sounds EXACTLY like what we need!
Sounds like you need my Pesticide X special formula, nya! One spray kills them all, nya!

options.text: I'll be right there.

reply.text: Frightened girl mode engaged. I can't even stand on the floor! I'm in my bed now! Please come quick!

options.text: And what mode are you in now?

reply.text: That was frightened girl scared of bugs mode.

460.text: My, look at Formidable. She's really giving it her all.

comments.text: Oh, this is from yesterday's rehearsal! Thank you for taking a photo of this moment.
You're welcome. Please keep up the good work.
My sister's really making her rock and roll debut! When is your album coming out?
After my current gig is done, I suppose? Stay tunedâ™ª
Sounds like she's managing her solo rehearsals just fine.
All the practice we did together laid the foundation for me to rehearse alone.
Oh really? We should do some sports together then. I already got Noshiro on board and we're just waiting for you.
That sounds lovely! I'll meet you at the gymnasium.

options.text: On my way to the practice stage!

reply.text: You won't find me there, I'm afraid. If you need me, I'll be at the gymnasium for a few hours.

options.text: I can hardly wait to see her live.

reply.text: Please sit tight! Alizarin will not disappoint.

461.text: Phew, what a workout. Wonder what I should do next.

comments.text: Damn you're amazing! You must be practicing like some olympian champion.
Not really, I just did my daily reps. If anyone here is amazing, it's you, the one with concert experience.
Let's call it even and say we're both amazing.
Attagirl. If you've got nothing better to do, you should come to the gymnasium.
I already got Formidable on board and we're just waiting for you.
You are? Okay, I'll get changed and head there right away.

options.text: Let's all meet up at the gymnasium.

reply.text: You're going there too? Okay, I'll see you in just a bit.

options.text: I think Eugen pulled a fast one on you.

reply.text: Yes, I just saw her juustagram post... Oh well, at least she's enjoying herself.

462.text: #commanderscoachingã€€Oops, looks like I scored the first goal!

comments.text: The commander's coaching you? Hell yeah! Let me in on the fun ;D
Sure. Bring some friends if you can. The more the merrier after all.
You heard her, knights of sea! Get in here!!
OMW
I'll be there in a sec!
Heading there now.
It must be quite difficult to make a Juustagram post in the middle of a match.
Not when you're the top player it isn't!
Actually, the match hasn't started yet since we don't even have a full team yet. This is just for show.
Well, it's doing a good job of getting people's attention.
What's that hashtag even supposed to mean?
That the Commander is coaching us, duh. You should come join us.
What makes you think I need any coaching?
Got it, you don't wanna come. I'll tell the Commander.
HEY! I didn't say anything about not coming! What I SAID is that I don't need coaching!

options.text: Since when am I anybody's coach?

reply.text: Since the moment I made this post, silly!

options.text: Alright, five steps to the right then charge!

reply.text: Thanks, coach! We're already 2 to 0 thanks to you!

463.text: Through mother nature, you will see Cyanidin's true merits.

comments.text: It really feels so different to sing to a forest rather than a crowd.
That sounds a lot like something you'd hear in Empery philosophy 101!
Um... I wouldn't say it's THAT deep.
I must say, this is very nice. Looking forward to seeing your performance in person.
By the way, you're overdue for a break. I'm hosting a tea party not far from you. Won't you join us?
Why, that's very kind of you. I will, gladly.
I applaud you, Kongou. For heeding Mother Nature's voice and feeling her power.
Much obliged. If you have any wisdom on the matter to share, I would be in your debt.
It would be my pleasure.
Then I'd better bring one additional chair to the tea party table!

options.text: What ARE Cyanidin's true merits?

reply.text: Positive energy, boundless hope, and candid freshness!

options.text: Spoken like a forest fairy! In a good way.

reply.text: Indeed. In fact, I'd say that's not a bad description of our unit's image.

464.text: Getting my cheerleading practice in! Let's go, team!

comments.text: I've prepared all the magic and items you'll need.
Thanks, Opie! Show the mages who's boss!
Can you come to the gymnasium? Our match could use some cheerleading.
You bet! I'll be rooting for you from the bleachers!
My tea party could use a little cheering. Would you mind?
Ask and you shall receive! Enjoy your tea and may your biscuits be tasty!

options.text: Woo! You're doing great, Tem!

reply.text: Appreciate it, Commander! You're doing great too!

options.text: Almost there. Needs a little more energy!

reply.text: YOU CAN DO IT!!! SHOW THEM HOW IT'S DONE!!! LET'S GOOO!!!

465.text: I'm out and about, looking for inspiration for a song.

comments.text: Ah, I see you went to the park as well. Our unit member bond must've pulled us together.
Yeah. Um, good luck on your practice.
Boise, I urge you to be mindful. You don't want to get lost in the woods!
I'm at the park, not the woods. I'm not sure how you'd even get lost in a park...
Well, if you do, I'll come and rescue you!
Thanks. I'll, uh, try not to stray too far.
Inspiration is spontaneous. You won't find it by looking for it. Incidentally, we're having a tea party nearby. Won't you join us?
Perhaps it will even inspire you in some way. You never know, right?
Maybe it will. I'll take you up on your offer.

options.text: So, did you find any inspiration?

reply.text: Not yet... I might be having a creativity block...

options.text: Hang in there! You'll succeed eventually!

reply.text: Um... You too!

466.text: Been working hard all day so it's time for a break!

comments.text: Working? Judging by your progress, I think you've just been gaming all day.
That's cause I'm a speedrunner. I make progress fast.
How do you speedrun a game you've never played before?
I can teach you how, young padawan.
girl keeps a whole stash of chips and coke at her job wtf
Gamer fuel is my lifeblood! I need them!
Mmm... Crisps and coke...
ruh roh here come the pirates

options.text: You've earned it. Do you want to game later tonight?

reply.text: DO I? Heck yeah! Hop on Shelldivers!

options.text: Working hard, or hardly working?

reply.text: A bit of column A, a bit of column B!

467.text: Emden has been keeping a cruise diary and recorded some observations on a certain passenger.

comments.text: Ooh are you keeping tabs on the commander? Lemme have a looksie at what you've got!
Yes, but the diary also contains our schedule. I'm afraid I can't let you have it.
Awww!
A treasure trove of info about the Commander! Dangit I wish I'd thought of that first!
Yes, I suppose it is a treasure trove, in that sense. "This treasure is Emden's. No one else may have it."

options.text: How did you... learn about these "observations"?

reply.text: That's a secret between us. "If you're truly curious, plead and beg and Emden shall tell you."

options.text: I feel like I've been made into a zoo animal...

reply.text: You already are an animal, human. Please make it easy for us both and accept it.

468.text: This new liquid coolant is excellent. It rapidly cools down one's emotion module and its texture appeals to one's taste module.

comments.text: Gascogne seeks to replicate recipe.
Encrypting secret recipe... done. Sending data packet now.
Composition analyzed. The ratio of lime juice to other ingredients is extremely high.
A tempting color, an irresistible aroma â€“ like the enchanting nectar of a witch.
That sounds like something the Commander would say... Oh no. That makes my emotion module tingle!

options.text: Wow! You're a real mixologist.

reply.text: You flatter me... This one is just, you know, capable of many things!

options.text: Can I have some?

reply.text: Axmfnswhwnjdf sorry I mean sure! I'll pour you a glass after I PICK UP THE PIECES OF MY EMOTION MODULE AAAA

469.text: Such a beautiful backdrop deserves a eulogy.

comments.text: A violinic melody in the moonlit night stirs the soul so.
The tale the melody tells, too, flows forth under the moon's light.
Visibility looks good! This would be perfect weather for a mission.
Echoes linger, but silence surrounds. This place is paradise.

options.text: The night is beautiful, and so are you.

reply.text: Thank you for the kind words, Swordbearer.

options.text: I want to hear one of your songs!

reply.text: I'd be happy to oblige. Which song would you like?

470.text: Watch this! I'm gonna deal you a hand with ~*magic*~!

comments.text: I admire you Fleur. You can do all these cool things I never could...
Hey, don't be sad. Everyone is good at SOMETHING!
Sounds like a movie I saw this one time. I think it was called High Stakes No Breaks?
Yeah I know that one! Good taste.

options.text: Cards and magic always have been a potent combination.

reply.text: They sure are. Attracts all kinds of people, from gamblers to people looking to be amazed.

options.text: I do NOT want to catch you cheating with your magic!

reply.text: Slander! I'd never cheat and get caught doing it!

471.text: I'm sorry about the mess... I'll start cleaning up right away!

comments.text: Geesh that IS a real mess! Don't worry tho, I'll come help you out!
Oh you really shouldn't! It's my fault so I should clean it up...
Did you trip? Because I just did... The cruise ship is rocking a lot. You're not hurt, are you?
Just a little lightheaded... I think I might be seasick.
Wait, shipgirls can get seasick? Is this official lore now?
There Ikazuchi goes again, talking about esoteric things...

options.text: Let me give you a hand. Also, watch out for glass shards.

reply.text: Oh gosh... Thank you so much Commander. I hope it's not too much...

options.text: Don't beat yourself up. It's the cruise ship's fault for rocking.

reply.text: Thanks for reassuring me... I'll try to be less hard on myself.

472.text: For the next 3 days, I'll pay for ALL the drinks and food at all the restaurants! Get out there and have your fill y'all!

comments.text: woohoo! you bet i'm gonna have my fill and then some!
Knock yourself out. And if there's any leftovers, feel free to pack em up and bring em back home!
Oh hell yeah. Come to the bar and let's get wasted!
And find out who holds their liquor better? I'm in!
god dayum i emptied my whole stock today! bless up for your generosity gurl
Anytime! I'm glad as long as everyone else is glad. Especially the Commander!

options.text: Thanks for footing the bill, chief! You're a legend.

reply.text: No prob! All's well in the world when every belly's full.

options.text: It's time to awaken... the black hole in my stomach!

reply.text: We'll fill that black hole yet!

473.text: Well well... I might have found a hidden area in the cruise ship.

comments.text: Ooh! This warrants exploration!
Yes buuut first I need to find a way inside.
You're talking to the master of finding a way in! The first thing you should look for is
Ruh-roh, An Shan is knocking on my door. I'll tell you another time!
This smells of dark secrets to me!
Yeah I DO smell something secret coming from inside...
I must know what! Stay put and I'll be right there!

options.text: Where are you even? I've never seen this place.

reply.text: Even you don't know what it is? Then I should DEFINITELY have a look around.

options.text: Try not to get lost... You know what? I'll come there to pick you up.

reply.text: Oh geez the Commander is coming to pick me up! Don't you worry, I'll sit tight like a good girl does <3

474.text: It seems that my Master cannot be without my ever-present service!

comments.text: Exemplary work. This is precisely the kind of elegance and etiquette expected of a Royal Maid.
Thank you for your kind words, Head Maid. I am honoured.
My, look at those eggs â€“ fried to perfection! Master will love them.
Yes, I counted the seconds while frying to ensure they suit my Master's tastes. I don't believe you get any better than my fried eggs.
You've made breakfast and poured coffee, now would you mind leaving?
I'm afraid I cannot. My Master needs my service.
Nobody NEEDS your service like it's oxygen. Plus, you're not even wearing a maid uniform!
It isn't the uniform that makes a maid, it's her service. As long as I'm serving my Master, I am doing my job as a maid.

options.text: Thanks for the grub, Scylla.

reply.text: No need to thank me. I know you cannot get by without me. Now, open wide, please!

options.text: Breakfast on the bed? Don't mind if I do!

reply.text: Surely you're not thinking of eating it yourself, are you? Allow me to feed you, Master. Open wide, please!

comments.text: Hi dizzy, I'm sleepy.
Hey... I told you to invite Tashkent to our pajama party Laffey! Why isn't she here?
I got so sleepy I forgot. I'm going to bed now, night night.
For the love of... Hey Tashkent, do you want to attend our pajama party?
Oh... let me think about it.
sheesh you got a fine outfit girl. careful so it dont get wrinkled!
Thanks but I like relaxing too much to care.
then you oughta try my wrinkle remover spray. it works like magic, no cap!
Now Owari's advertising in the replies? I'd just gotten used to Akashi doing that! (~_~;)
If you wanna make the most of this vacay you should come up and play some games.
Is that so? Challenge accepted.
Attagirl! Show me what you got!

options.text: Do you still have energy in you for a few more games?

reply.text: Sure... if you'll play, dear comrade.

options.text: On my way to the arcade now.

reply.text: I'll reserve a spot for you... the game is starting soon.

comments.text: Whoooa! Imagine how it'd look if you had ten times the fireworks!
Then I bet my owner could see it from anywhere in the world!
Ooh that gives me an idea. A BIG idea, heheh...
I'm surprised by how good it looks. Can the fireworks be shot from a cannon?
I put all my love into it so of course it looks good! Hmm I think if you modify the fireworks a bit then you could.
Modify them? Understood. I'll give that a try.
Sheffield, what are you planning?
Oh man that's beautiful. You gonna do a full fireworks show?
Nuh! This is a special surprise magic trick I made just for my owner :3
You know I could use a big showoffy trick like this to surprise the Commander with...
I'll teach you how to do it!

options.text: Greatest magic show of all time! Full stop!

reply.text: Yay! I'm so happy you love it!! Come here so I can glomp you owner :3

options.text: I wish I was there to see them with you.

reply.text: That can be arranged! An encore for you, owner!

477.text: The wolf of the tundras never misses her mark.

comments.text: Impressive! You shot the ball right in from such a steep angle!
Hey now, you're not half bad yourself. You scored that last ball on the first shot.
That's my sister for you. I want in on this.
The table's about to get mighty crowded, I feel...
Kursk! Play a match with me!
You're on. Don't expect me to go easy on you.
The warming up has finished. Now let us see who'll be first to seize victory.
A hunter is a hunter even at the pool table. Let's find out who's best.

options.text: What's next? Going to clear the whole table with one shot?

reply.text: Winning just like that is no fun. I like to let my prey wander a bit first.

options.text: Looks like you've got a lot of people challenging you.

reply.text: And I never shy away from a challenge. Think you can take me on too?

478.text: In the waters, I grasped it â€“ the very sensation of holding a sword.

comments.text: How are you content with not holding a real sword? Know you some secret that I do not?
Simply believe that there is a sword in your hands.
I CAAAN'T! I NEED MY SWORD! I NEED IT!
Is this what is meant by, "it isn't the blade that matters, but the hand that holds it"? The path of bushido is a long one.
The path of the sword never ends. The strong must ever look forward.
What you say is true.
I wonder if drinking hot milk after the bath is what gave you this insight.
While I did indeed have milk, it was in fact my warrior's intuition that gave me this.
So you HAVE learned the appeal of milk after a bath. Finally!
Enough about the milk already...

options.text: So... you've learned a new skill?

reply.text: I've learned something you yourself should try. You may learn something unexpected from it.

options.text: Sounds like a case of manifesting your spirit as a sword.

reply.text: I've never heard of such a thing before, though it is an interesting concept.

479.text: Oh this is awful... The AC is completely on the fritz.

comments.text: Are you that surprised, Miss? Didn't you calculate that the AC would break?
Well... yes I did see it coming, but experiencing it breaking firsthand is so much worse.
If you knew it would break, why didn't you get it repaired?
Because calculations can't just be updated on the fly. I'll just have to ask someone to repair it again.
Weird! I thought the commander fixed that just a few days ago!
Some other component must have broken down. I suppose I'll ask the Commander for a hand again.
Oh okay. But wait do air conditioners really break THAT quick???
If it doesn't get fixed soon, the sun will turn me well done...
Mmm, well done... Now I'm hungry for some meat. Let's throw a barbecue party in the classroom!
Indoors? Then we'll have to take ventilation into account.
Don't worry miss! I'm sure it'll be fine!

options.text: It broke AGAIN?!

reply.text: Yes and my prediction came true. The question is, what do we do now?

options.text: I'll bring a toolbox and be right there!

reply.text: No need to, I've got all the tools right here.

comments.text: I feel you. It's like a part of me is missing when I don't have my phone. Wait... how are you online now?
it was in my pocket like a second ago how could it disappear like that...
Relax! I'm sure it's somewhere nearby.
I have to ask: how are you posting on Juustagram if you've lost your phone?
OH... right, lol im so goddamn stupid
This gives me an invention idea! A device that lets you browse Juustagram without a phone!
Girl did you seriously not realize it while you were TYPING ON YOUR PHONE???
i wish i was joking but no
So both you and Liverpool couldn't figure out your phone was literally in your hands...
It's a normal thing okay? It's like looking for your glasses when you're already wearing them!

options.text: Careful there. Don't wanna hit your head on the bedframe.

reply.text: ty mandy ill keep that in mind

options.text: You really didn't stop and think about it for a sec?

reply.text: lghgfoigf im so cringe.....

481.text: Just got done setting up a Thing to ensure the Commander's safety!

comments.text: Damn it... I was going to do that...
Seems a little insect has crawled her way in. I think it's time for some pest control.
This is a necessary step to protect the Commander. That means it's 100% legal and you can't do anything about it!
Stop playing with the office keycard. Be careful with it or you'll drop it.
Relaaax, that's not gonna happen. I'm the Commander's personal bodyguard
For your sake, I sure hope so.

options.text: Is this system really as airtight as you claim?

reply.text: Don't worry, it follows every rule in the book!

options.text: Is that a spare keycard? Thanks!

reply.text: You're welcome! Anything for you.

482.text: Behold as I, the rebel against evil, display my powers!

comments.text: How brave of you to show yourself, rebel! Now you must decide: will you face me, or will you flee?
There you are, despicable demon idol! I have no reason to flee or hide from the likes of you!
Well well, a new demon enters the stage. Kneel before me if you know what's good for you!
Never, foul hellspawn! The rebel does not bend the knee to your kin!
Then have at you! Three forbidden seals, I remove thee! Unleash the bewitching eyes!
Tell me about Dark Requiem! Is it some kind of league of bad guys?
Indeed! They are a cunning organization dedicated to luring people to the path of darkness!
Then a hero's gotta liberate the world from their clutches of evil! A hero... like me!

options.text: The outcome of this great battle is all but determined!

reply.text: Right you are. The Dark Requiem WILL fall!

options.text: That's some pretty cool lighting.

reply.text: But of course. I labored and toiled hard in the construction of this secret base. Come and pay a visit, Commander!

483.text: Hmm. Which one do I play tonight?

comments.text: Both! AT THE SAME TIME!
Excuse me?
You heard me! Just play the piano and the violin at the same time.
Yes, yes, but that's easier said than done. Show me how YOU'D do it.
Pfft easy. I saw this one anime where they do it. I'll show you!
If you can't make up your mind, consider leaving the decision to the Holy Iris.
Pray and hope for a divine revelation, you mean?
I believe she's saying you should simply flip a coin.
If two instruments at once is too much, you could always find a partner to perform a duet with.
That's hardly a solution... The only difference is I have to decide WHO to play with rather than WHAT to play.
I can be your violin player no problem, sweetie.
If you'll allow me the honor, I'll be your piano player.
That's settled then! Go play, girls!
So... where's MY part in this?

options.text: Is there an option to play neither?

reply.text: That WOULD solve my problem, actually... I'll play the harp instead.

options.text: I'll gladly listen to either one!

reply.text: Really? In that case, I'll perform one time with each for you then.

484.text: The workplace is a battleground, and I will claim victory for myself!

comments.text: You're on fire... literally!
This is what a burning-hot fighting spirit looks like!
Someone get a fire extinguisher, quick!
No need. I will keep blazing through the paperwork until everything turns to ashes!
Can't you just like... sign the paper and move on to the next one?
That'll cause serious problems later on! Did you do just that with YOUR paperwork? Let me check them again!
I was just kidding okay?! Don't take everything so seriously!
Remember to take breaks and charge your batteries. Should I bring you some pastries and herbal tea?
Thanks. I'd really appreciate that.
I want some too please.
Tell it to her, not me. Also, have you finished your work for today yet?
Of course it's finished. I'm not some no good slacker!

options.text: How many days off do you want for this?

reply.text: One day would be fine. Thanks.

options.text: Do you go through the gist first, or everything in order?

reply.text: Everything in order! My goal is to leave no document unsigned!

485.text: Templar knights look SO cool when they practice.

comments.text: Wait... how did you get this photo?
By being a good journalist, and good journalists never let the little moments slip by! Also I wanna interview you when you're done.
Okay then...
Cool pose. I want to replicate it.
Come down to the training grounds and let me snap some pics of you then!
Not a fan of staged pictures. I wanna do it in a real fight.
If you count a friendly duel as a real fight, I'd be happy to oblige.
Yusss! I KNEW it was a good idea to stake out the training grounds!
Nice sword.
Nice sword.
Nice sword.
Are you knowledgeable on swords, Fu Shun?
Nope I just saw a bandwagon and hopped on it.

options.text: Knight of the Holy Iris, show us your shimmering blade!

reply.text: I'm getting deja vu... At any rate, my sword does not shimmer. I'm not Marseillaise.

options.text: You look so cool. "Ready to cut the baddies in half" kind of cool.

reply.text: I still don't know how she took this picture of me... regardless, thank you, I suppose.

486.text: Fast, convenient, reliable. That's Fargo Shipping. V(o_o)V

comments.text: Unable to determine the meaning of the word "V(o_o)V".
It's text made to look like a facial expression. Fargo is presumably trying to say that she's happy.
Then there's (///.///) to indicate embarrassment, and (^-^) which also means you're happy!
Interesting. Let me try... (^-^)
That feel when you wake up and your package is already at your doorstep is sooo good. Not having to go outside slaps.
Fargo Shipping prides itself on 24 hour delivery. Our mission is the fastest delivery in the business.
24 hour delivery every day of the year? Hum hum... Sounds exploitative if you don't even have lunch breaks.
Come to think of it, I'VE been working for 24 hours straight now...
Go home and sleep for god's sake!!!
Oh yeah? I bought something 3 days ago and the tracking info hasn't updated at all!
I have a theory! Her drone has been locked in combat with a giant squid monster for 3 days straight and that's why it hasn't delivered!
FOR REAL??? Who's gonna win???
Tell me where it is! I wanna watch!
Your package was returned to our depot because you wrote the wrong address.

options.text: What do your drones run on? Mawnster Energy?

reply.text: While I drink it occasionally, that's not suitable drone fuel. Do you want to know my favorite flavor?

options.text: Fargo Shipping â€“ Connecting the Port!

reply.text: Our slogan rings true. As thanks for the promotion, I'll give you a discount on your next order.

487.text: You gotta have a cold one on great nights like this.

comments.text: Where are you drinking? We should have a party tonight. I've not had a good binge in a long while.
That's not what you think it is. She's drinking juice.
Juice? JUICE of all things?
If you've got the mindset to get tipsy, it doesn't matter what you drink.
thx for buying my fresh fruits btw! i got some healthy premade meals for sale too if you're interested
Where can I get that? Link please!
HelloOwari offers fresh, delicious, low-calorie meals at a low price! I've ordered from them 10 times! (Get cash back for posting this message on social media, excluding this part in brackets!)
No advertising, nya! And no stealth or direct marketing either, nya! It's unfair competition, nya!
Hey aren't you the one who told me to pose with this drinking glass? Or does that not count as stealth marketing?

options.text: Geesh, you must've had a lot.

reply.text: Yeah oops I might've had too much cause it was just that good. You should try some yourselfâ™¡

options.text: You should invite me next time!

reply.text: Next time? How about NOW? I'll be at your quarters in 5 min with some juiceâ™¡

488.text: Training's done that means time to CHUG SOME PROTEIN!

comments.text: Know any good protein formulas? Don't leave me hanging here.
DM'd you a link. Just take licorice, blue cheese, and kale and mix em together!
Sounds good. Send me the link so I can make it too.
Are you for real girl? You just wanna torture yourself or something?
Will drinking that make me stronger?
You bet! Pair it with 8 hours of lifting daily and you'll be the strongest knight ever.
I hope it'll make me taller too!
If this protein mix has such potent effects, we should add it to the canteen's menu.
HELL NO!
EIGHT HOURS of LIFTING? Are you trying to kill me?!

options.text: Wish you could build muscle just by drinking protein.

reply.text: Neglect your muscles and they'll neglect you.

options.text: Oh man, that color...

reply.text: Makes you thirsty doesn't it? I even threw in some red cabbage.

489.text: Yuck! This whole batch of canned herring suuucks!

comments.text: How do you tell the difference between good and bad herring? Isn't the flavor practically the same?
The quality of the fish, the salt content, and how long it's been fermented all affect the flavor. You'll know when you taste it.
Holy crap... I could smell it just by walking past your room ^^'
hey in case anyone starts feeling sick im manning the infirmary today so
Ah, so you were reviewing herring. I sent a team of Royal Maids to investigate because I thought a drainage pipe had been clogged.
Head Maid, we've got a problem! Nubian was first on the scene and she's out cold!
May her soul rest in peace. I suggest that we tackle this threat with firepower.
Take it easy Sheffy! Don't go blowing things up!
That's +1 to my "never allowed inside the kitchen" list.
What?
COME OOON TAKE ME OFF THE LIST PLEEEASE T_T
Hey it's okay! You'll get chances to adventure inside the kitchen even if you're on the list!
At least my cooking isn't AS bad as canned herring... right?
Mental gymnastics won't save you.

options.text: What's your favorite brand?

reply.text: The one that's going on your plate next!

options.text: What's the point of reviewing this stuff?

reply.text: To spread the gospel of canned herring, duh!

490.text: The ninja run is SO cool! I've gotta learn how to do it!

comments.text: Yes. The ninja run is the best way to get around the port.
From a scientific perspective, the ninja run isn't really faster at all. Your effort's better spent practicing the da Vinci run!
What's the da Vinci run?
Dunno yet. I'm still working on it!
Really? Does it make you go faster? Now I want to try it!
Not only is it faster, it's cooler than ordinary running! Just be careful so you don't run too far and get lost.
You're the only one who gets lost while running.
I just saw a blur run past my window. I think it was Shimakaze.

options.text: All hail the ninja run!

reply.text: Once I master it, I'll be able to appear at your office in a flash!

options.text: Bell, you shall become the Kage!

reply.text: I wish! I'll try at least.

491.text: I like to draw when mr sun is shining bright so look at these birdies ( à¹‘â•¹ ê‡´â•¹)

comments.text: I draw stuff too! Master hai tien taught me how to draw a bird!
That was supposed to be a bird? Sheesh she's got her work cut out for her...
I wanna draw too with friends!
I'll bring a canvas so we can draw outdoors!
Okie dokie just be quick while mr sun is still out!
That scenery is beautiful. Where are you? I'd like to see it in person.
Ummmm... it's so sunny I don't really know where I am...
Aw, that's unfortunate. I'm not quite sure where I am, either.
Both of you stay where you are. I'll come get you.
Oh lawd are those dango? Now I'm hungry! Especially for some of them delicious meals you make.
Okay we'll eat dinner together when mr sun sets!

options.text: What adorable little birdies.

reply.text: Hehe thanks! You can have my drawing!

options.text: I'll go to where you are, so just stay there.

reply.text: Okay! I've got pencils for you so we can draw together!

492.text: I've got a ticket that gives unlimited access to all the rides!

comments.text: Lady Yuen, making a splash! I need a ticket like this!
Adventurer Fu Shun, comin' at ya! Ticket pls kthxbye.
Investigator Bristol, arriving on the scene! Can I get a ticket?
Anchorage here! Can I enter, without a ticket?
You lot get a free pass, don't worry!
Ooh! When it comes to amusement parks, the more, the merrier!
You can even invite as many as you want. It's a pretty sweet deal.
Oh sweet visiting the amusement park with friends sounds awesome. Is there a group discount?
Not at the moment.
No discount deals at an amusement park, nya? I'd better talk to the management, nya!

options.text: I want a ticket. Send me one.

reply.text: No need to! All rides are free for you.

options.text: What rides are good? Any recommendations?

reply.text: The merry-go-round is a favourite of mine. And a favourite of the destroyers!

493.text: (Created with voice input) Big manjuu cotton candy mmm so good

comments.text: do they come in other shapes? like a cute bunny or something *-*
Hey, don't go eating rabbits! Cute things are to be protected, not consumed!
I want some of that!
(Created with voice input) There is bunny and kitty cotton canned dee ask nicely and you can have some
Don't forget to brush you're teeth.
(Created with voice input) Oh no! I forgot to brush yesterday I'm gonna get cabby tees
Your teeth are all gonna fall out!
Look there's candy stuck on your cheek!
(Created with voice input) I licked it up it was still super yummy

options.text: You ate that quick. I'll get you a bigger one next time.

reply.text: (Created with voice input) OK! We can get a big big big one and share it command deer

options.text: Had your fill? What do you want to ride next?

reply.text: (Created with voice input) Spinning teacups let's go to that

494.text: I had yokan, cake, and macarons. They were all delicious.

comments.text: Glad you liked the macarons. I made a fresh batch, if you'd like more.
Yes, please. They were delectable.
Hmph! Our treats at teatime are every bit as good as the Orthodoxy's! Bel, show them!
Lady Amagi, would you please open the door? The Royal Maids has arrived with a dining cart.
How about taking this opportunity to hold a dessert-tasting party? I can make water buns.
Great idea. I was thinking the same thing.
Party, eh? Sounds good! I'll bring some low-carb snacks loaded with protein.
"Loaded with protein" better not mean "literally made of protein powder" like last time lmao.

options.text: What if we merged them all into a single dessert?

reply.text: Readily coming up with ideas no one ever has before - that's just like you, Commander. If we manage to combine them, you'll be the first to taste the result.

options.text: There's more where that came from. Eat all you like.

reply.text: Thank you. That said, I'd be even happier to have you rather than more desserts.

comments.text: Yes, the crepes really were heavenly.
Agreed. All 3 of them tasted great. We should try different flavors next time!
3? I only see 2 in the picture.
Our camerawoman had the last one.
That means me.
Huh... Your crÃªpes look different from ours. I bet they're still good though!
Interested in trying one? Then I'll find some recipes and study them.
I can buy one for you, if you'd like.
wooow i didn't know akagi had the facial muscles required to smile
It's a shame this is the last time YOU will ever get to see it.

options.text: You're making me hungry here...

reply.text: Well, if my love can satiate your cravings, I can offer lots and lots of that!

options.text: What stand did you get those at?

reply.text: No need to go perusing stalls, Commander. I'll come and feed you one myself!

496.text: These fireworks patterns are so cute.

comments.text: I tried to switch a pattern onto my sunfish plushie's clothes, but it didn't go well and I pricked my finger... T-T
You should refrain from stitching in the dark of night, when it's hard to see. I'll be there with a plaster soon.
Okay... Thank you ;-;
Yes, stitching is best done during the day.
Boom boom! Can you embroider a pattern of my super special fireworks too? :3
You mean a pattern like your face with a smile? Of course I can do that.
A handkerchief embroidered with Cheshire's face, nya... Sounds like a business opportunity, nya!
Can you embroider with like glowing thread? I want clothes with that so I can be the number one brightest star at night!
You would be pretty bright, I suppose...
Bright like a genius? Yeah I know!
But why?

options.text: This reminds me of that handkerchief you made for me.

reply.text: Yes, though I added some changes. I'll make another one for you.

options.text: Inspiration comes from life, as they say.

reply.text: That it does. That idea has really started to hit home with me ever since I met you.

497.text: Why is it so hard to fix my bunny's ribbon? I'm gonna be late for the banquet... >.<

comments.text: Oh dear... You haven't put on your dress yet?
Ummm... no because I don't know how to... I'm so not gonna make it in time...
Don't cry. Lay the dress out flat and send me a picture of it and I'll tell you how to put it on.
Can't get into your dress huh? You'll just have to go nude then!
Tsk, tsk, Mogador. Wearing nothing at all isn't nearly as exciting as being barely dressed like she is.
I'm NOT going out like that!!!
Hang in there! I'll start making a Bunny Ribbon Straighten-Outer for you!
Really? Thank you...
I just need 3 days!
You don't need a super niche machine to put on a dress.

options.text: Don't panic. Take it slow.

reply.text: It's not helping... I still can't put my dress on T-T

options.text: Need a hand?

reply.text: Oh gosh... Yes please...

498.text: I think I've made friends with the horse.

comments.text: Aww, it's so cute! I wish I could play with the animals all day!
If I wanted to play with them all day, what should I do?
Hmm you could mimic their calls and try to communicate with them.
I see... Is that why Akashi says nya? To try to communicate with cats?
No, that's completely unrelated, nya.
Wow, it's rare to see you having fun like this!
Yeah, I had fun cause this horse wasn't scared of me.
Scans indicate that the merry-go-round is inanimate. The probability that you "made friends" is nonexistent.
My analysis also failed to conclude any change whatsoever in its emotion index.
Shut up! You're just going to make her sad with that talk!
Really, huh... The horse LOOKED like it was having fun.

options.text: You must've charmed it with how cute you are.

reply.text: Commander... Well, thanks...

options.text: We should go to the zoo and take pictures sometime.

reply.text: Sure. With you there, I'm sure the animals won't run away from me...

comments.text: You look like the spitting image of Murasaki no Choumu, AKA Lois "Brilliant Kirial" Lolita Purple.
Who the heck is that?
The main character of That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Vampire Lord. Have you not heard of her?
Not even once.
Bet those wings make your AA capabilities even better. Would make swatting mosquitoes easier too!
guess we doin bug swatting now
There is no need for wings to squash pests. My guns are more than enough.
Please, PLEASE don't use your guns inside the port.

options.text: You're doing god's work, cleaning up the place.

reply.text: Cleaning is a hard job, but it's the duty of a maid.

options.text: I wanna give that a try sometime.

reply.text: Oh, you mean cleaning? You may borrow my guns. I'm joking, of course.

500.text: A few ribbons won't stop me from performing my maid duties.

comments.text: You can still do work while completely tied up? That's incredible!
What... is she doing? Is this what qualifies as maid fashion these days?
By no means is this maid attire. Please remember that.
Sirius, if you want to get any work done, please undo those ribbons first.
Well... Apologies, Head Maid, but I can't undo them on my own...
Ooh, this looks fun. I should try it on the Commander next time!
Good idea... It IS worth trying this on my Commander...
If you insist, then I must be present when you do it! For everyone's safety, of course!
Excuse me?

options.text: That's my maid!

reply.text: I scarcely deserve such lavish praise, my honourable Master!

options.text: On my way now to help you out.

reply.text: Thank you, my benevolent Master!

501.text: I can bring cold milk to you, wherever you may be in the park!

comments.text: We can bring you anything, anywhere, nya! We're also open to business deals, nya.
Nya? Why are you talking like a cat, Fargo?
Are you alright? Should I call Jervis for you?
Oh no! She's been hacked!
I was just mimicking Akashi. My working theory is that doing so will lead to more partnerships.
Good idea, nya! Just gotta pay the licensing fee for my likeness, nya!
A cold beverage helps you stay cool on hot days. Just don't drink too much milk.
Hot milk could work too. It'll make you sweat, and that in turn will cool you down.
I'll um give it a try after I'm done delivering all this milk!
Milk makes you grow big, doesn't it? Hipper could use that, so I'll buy a bottle.
EXCUSE ME??? What do you MEAN I "could use that"???
Okay! I'll be right there!

options.text: Let me give you a hand. You look ready to fall over.

reply.text: Thank you, Commander. While I don't feel like I'm going to fall, I still appreciate the help.

options.text: Pace yourself so you don't get heatstroke.

reply.text: Thank you, I'll bear that in mind. Some cold milk ought to help keep me cool!

502.text: Watch out, dragon slide, because I'm coming for you!

comments.text: That looks fun! I'm gonna call Ã‰pÃ©e and we'll all slide down it together.
I dunno Fleur... That looks pretty dangerous...
A hero never runs away from a challenge!
Exactly!
whats the diff between that and a regular
A regular what? Your sentence cut off.
I'm guessing she bumped into something and it hit send.
Oh. I heard a scream just now, come to think of it...
Girls, come on! Watch where you're going!

options.text: That slide's gonna regret the day it met you!

reply.text: The day it met US, Milord! Come with me and let us slay the dragon (slide) together!

options.text: I'll be at the water area in 5!

reply.text: Then I'll be waiting for you! By our powers combined, no slide shall stand in our way!

503.text: Since I'm running out space for these stuffed animals, I will start giving them away.

comments.text: Do you reckon the little destroyers would like me more if I gave them some of those?
(Created with voice input) Oh cute bear I want one please
i want one too!! is it really 100% free? o.o
It is. You can have it as long as you want it.
(Created with voice input) Hooray thank you moose a she
thx ^-^! i'll take super duper good care of him
You should do like a raffle and you comment for a chance to win. That's way more interesting imo.
I'll out-luck you all, mark my words!
I know I'm not gonna win... but I still want to enter...
Comment a bajillion times to improve your chances! That's what I'm gonna do!
The question is, how does one set up a raffle with this...?

options.text: Cool sunglasses.

reply.text: The sunglasses, too, I won at the target gallery. If you fancy them, you may have them.

options.text: Are there any left for me?

reply.text: Certainly. Pick whatever you please. I am a granter of your wishes, as you'll remember.

504.text: Have a gander at my new katana!

comments.text: The secrets of the blade shall be realized in its sharpening.
You can tell that from a picture alone?
That I can. Epiphanies are not bound by form.
And it is through successive epiphanies that mastery is achieved. Something which I still aspire to.
That looks preeetty sharp to me. Be careful when handling it, okay?
Wonder if you could use it to chop food...
Don't liken a katana to a kitchen knife! It's rude!
However you decide to use it, just please remember: safety first.
My katana and I have become one! It cannot hurt me!
Take care. Her blade...
Has quite a burn.
*licks it and dies instantly*
Hah! I got the reference!
What the hell are you all talking about?

options.text: Now that's a nice katana!

reply.text: It sure is! Ask, and I'll make one of comparable quality for you!

options.text: Got any tips on sword maintenance?

reply.text: You bet I do. Stay put and I'll come teach you the ropes.
